This pack makes the entire Chaos Warrior race from the main game playable in the Grand Campaign and multiplayer matches; as well as adding entirely new Legendary Lords, Lords, Heroes, Units, Magic Items and more.

Lay waste to the Old World as the dreaded Chaos Warriors. This Pack includes a full roster of bloodthirsty units, terrifying mounts and monstrous creatures. Lead the corrupted Chaos hordes as one of three new playable Legendary Lords. Embrace the Ruinous Powers as you embark on brand new quest chains, unlocking powerful items and gaining glory in the name of the dark Chaos Gods.

Beyond Kislev, beyond Troll Country, beyond even the barren Norsca Peninsula lies a land shrouded in darkness, frozen in an unnatural, never-ending winter. Here, the mortal realm and the immaterial realm of Chaos overlap, creating an uncontrollable gateway to that infernal dimension from which all manner of nightmarish creatures spew forth.

It is a place where few mortals have dared to venture, and even fewer have returned. The wild people that live in the lands to the south are devout in their worship of the Chaos Gods and many seek to journey north and offer themselves up to become tools of their will. Those that do survive this unholy pilgrimage and live to tell the tale are irreversibly altered. Clad in dark armour bearing the dread marks of ruinous favour, possessed of an unwavering resolve to carry out the will of their malevolent deities, with the indomitable Archaon the Everchosen as their leader, these are the mighty Chaos Warriors!

name: ToVer Defense
summary: Do your best to defend your virtual castle from enemies trying to invade it! Can you get the most out of resources such as crossbow, teleportation and... magic?!

name: Together in Battle
summary: Together in Battle is a game of love, friendship, and turn-based tactical combat! Recruit proc gen characters with unique portraits, personalities, backgrounds, and interests. By day, it's an SRPG; by night, it becomes a social sim. You'll never get the same characters twice!

name: Total Overdose
summary: Take control of Ramiro Cruz, a man on a crazy mission through Mexico's drug-fueled underworld. An amazing combat system keeps the action intense, mixing third person action with an incredible combo system for maximum carnage - and maximum replayability. Hilarious special moves and a huge amount of weaponry makes Total Overdose as frantic and fun an adventure as you could ever hope to find, and a red-hot latin soundtrack fits the action perfectly. This can be the perfect Latino gangsta sandbox game you were looking for all your life!

name: Torshtra Minkan Setsuwashuu yori: Kokuou no Musume
To Farm Lands
summary: Cultivate logic, harvest stars

name: Touhou Soujinengi V: The Genius of Sappheiros
summary:
Touhou Soujinengi: The Genius of Sappheiros is a fan-made Touhou Project game and a traditional turn-based RPG released at Comiket 78, heavily influenced by traditional console roleplaying games such as the SaGa Series. Despite being an RPG, it follows a traditional Touhou stage-based format, with each stage being its own dungeon. The game is made using the Unity game engine.

An updated version was announced for the PlayStation Vita version, under the name of "Touhou Soujinengi V", as part of Play, Doujin!

name: Touhou Rock Maiden FC 3: Little Native Goddess's Revival
summary:
The third installment in the Famicom-style Rock Maiden series!
A Rockman-inspired action game faithfully recreating screen size (double display), colors, and more!
Plus, powerful Famicom arrangements for the BGM by ARA from Hobby Workshop Ninjin Wine!
Use charge shots, slides, and special weapons to take down enemies!
Play with restrictions like owata mode and charge shot on/off!
Even greater fidelity than the previous title!

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Mission-Pack
summary:
This package adds three extra-missions to the first original game in the series.

The first mission requires the infiltration of a Georgian warehouse (the original Kola Cell mission, from March 2003). It pushes Sam Fisher to the limits, with a lot of security measures and enemies.

The second mission is titled Vselka Infiltration and the general story is that information collected at the Kola Facility indicates that Colonel Alekseevich's cell has orders to capture a Russian submarine manufacturing facility. There is a nuclear submarine and Fisher must prevent the takeover.

The third and final mission, Vselka Submarine, shows that Alekseevich's men have taken control of the submarine and Fisher must access the onboard computers to locate the status of the nuclear warheads.

name: Too Different
summary: Unravel the mysterious past of your parents and homeland while journeying through four unique lands in this exciting science-fantasy adventure!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Deluxe Edition
summary:
This version contains:

- Base Game
- Year 1 Operators
- Year 2 Operators

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operator Edition
summary:
Includes the full game, all maps, modes, and 38 unique operators from Years 1 through 5 of Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege.

Dive into explosive 5v5 gameplay, high-stakes competition, and thrilling PvP battles solo or with friends. The game is optimized for Xbox Series X (up to 4K and 120 fps).

name: Touhou: Hotline Sanzu
summary: An arcade shooter / immersive sim where you solve problems with guns, backstabs, and strategic use of vents.

name: Tower Tactics 2
summary: The fusion of deck-building roguelike and tower defense returns, bigger than ever! Build your deck with powerful new cards, unlock unique trinkets, and deploy enhanced towers to overcome relentless waves of enemies and new strategic challenges.

name: Todd is Late
summary: An FMV point & click adventure race against the clock.

name: Towerdefense Blobsmash
summary: Relaxing, casual single-Player Tower Defense Game for breaks in life.

name: Towers II: Plight of the Stargazer
summary: An unreleased GBC port of the Atari Jaguar game Towers II: Plight of the Stargazer.

name: Town of Passion
summary:
Town of Passion is an adventure styled RPG, where you play as a common villager living in the small town of Valencia; a town full of many secrets and populated only by beautiful women. After stumbling into an unknown realm, the villager learns that there's an important role for him to fulfill: utilize Pleasure to save those that watch over Valencia!

Solve tricky puzzles! Help out around Valencia and build relationships with the Villagers! And go out and explore the exciting world filled with lustful Monster Girls!

name: Tower of Kalemonvo
summary: Crawl to the top of the Tower of Kalemonvo, a hardcore isometric ARPG experience with randomly generated levels meant for fans of slower paced action games. Fight cultists, scavenge for magical items, use powerful spells and customize your stats and skills!

name: Total War: Warhammer - Wurrzag
summary:
Wurrzag is a Free Legendary Lord for Total War: Warhammer, introducing a new character to start your campaign or multiplayer games with.

Like all Legendary Lords, Wurrzag unlocks a series of unique quest-chains as he levels up. Each rewards him with his legendary wargear, transforming his abilities in Battle and Campaign. Wurrzag has three quest-chains, bestowing him with The Baleful Mask, The Bonewood Staff and his Squiggly Beast.

name: Toby: The Secret Mine
summary: A challenging puzzle platformer inspired by games like Limbo and Badland.

name: Torn
summary: Join an all-out sci-fi vehicular warfare using all possible variations of battle technologies including robots, tanks, wheeled machines, hovers mounted with deadly weapons that can be combined in hundreds of different ways.

name: Toshoshitsu no Neversista
summary:
During a stormy summer night, a student met his death.

He left to take a picture of the rising waters in the river and never returned. All that was left of him were his belongings and the camera by the riverbank. Even after days of desperate searches, all anyone could find was one of his shoes.

In the end, he was treated as a casualty of the river...but soon other, sinister rumors of his death began to emerge. That the five friends who used to live in "The Haunted Tower" with him -- one of them, some of them, all of them -- may have had something to do with his cursed death.

Enter two people.

One, the student's older brother. He receives a mysterious letter about his brother's death, and as soon as he begins to investigate, he's hit by a blunt object and loses consciousness.

Only to wake up again in a dark room with five students surrounding him, interrogating him, and knowing that they will never let him leave...

Two, an idealistic assistant teacher who just arrived in town. He receives a cryptic warning from an intruder in his dorm, "The Haunted Tower," to "never think those five are children" -- the poor, sad, well-behaved five students who undeservedly suffer from bad rumors.

Caught between paranoia and the desire to trust his students, one day he finds a book titled "Neversista," which holds a startling truth...

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 2 redefined an already great game. Its addition of stellar new features (like Create-A-Park), and great game-play tweaks (the manual maneuver will be copied for years to come) made it the best installment in a killer series of games. Anyone who has ever skated the Philadelphia level will agree -- this game is a masterpiece of level design. Hell, it's a masterpiece all around. There isn't a bad park or dull moment, just pure gaming nirvana!

name: Todo Ryunosuke Tantei Nikki: Ogon no Rashinban
summary:
Ōgon no Rashinban ("Golden Compass") is the second case starring the private detective Ryūnosuke Tōdō, following Kohakuiro no Yuigon. Like the first case, the adventure takes place in the 1920s. This time the investigator finds himself on a ship sailing from San Francisco to Yokohama. A mysterious murder occurs, and it is up to Tōdō to gather evidence and find the culprit.

Like its predecessor, the game mainly follows an adventure format with some simulation elements. The game is heavy on realistic investigation routine, and mostly consists of questioning characters and finding clues that would help to solve the case. Unlike the previous entry, the game has isometric graphics with superimposed character portraits, and elements of point-and-click interface (e.g. when navigating the ship map and accessing various locations).

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura
summary: Touhou Danmaku Kagura is a mobile rhythm game. It will be the first dedicated Touhou arrangement rhythm game to be released on smartphones and with gacha mechanics. The rhythm game session will be presenting the character having a danmaku battle against an opponent with a beatmap on the foreground. The player must beat the song played in the battle without missing too many beats.

name: Tohu-Teka
summary: A Turn Based RPG, following a high school student that mysteriously falls into a unknown fantasy world, where they must help the ongoing civil war, between an evil King and a willful rebellion.

name: Tokyo Crash Mobs
summary: A rather peculiar game that tasks you with throwing colour co-ordinated people at others in a queue. It's as crazy as it sounds.

name: Tokimeki Restaurant
summary: A restaurant business otome game.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 is a 2001 skateboarding video game and the third installment in the Tony Hawk's series. Skate as the legendary Tony Hawk or choose from a dream team of 12 top pro skaters, including old favorites like Lasek, Thomas, Muska, and Steamer, as well as new talent like Gilfberg, Caballero, Koston, and Mullen. Travel from L.A. to Tokyo, Suburbia to Skater's Island performing challenges and meeting goals with new moves that include the Revert, which allows you to link vert tricks, and flatland tricks such as Caspers, the Primo, and Handstand Manual.

name: Togainu no Chi
summary: Togainu no Chi is a Japanese BL visual novel. Can you help Akira, numb from a lifetime of violence and isolation, forge the bonds he needs to survive a ruined Tokyo's deadly underworld?

name: Touhou Library Survivors
summary: Thousands of fairies and familiar faces are swarming the Scarlet Devil Mansion Library! Help Patchouli Knowledge survive by attacking back with bullet hell Spell Cards, gathering experience, and upgrading exponentially!

name: Tomb Raider
summary:
Tomb Raider is a 3D action game developed by Core Design and published by Eidos Interactive. The game follows the exploits of Lara Croft, a British female archaeologist in search of ancient treasures.

The objective of Tomb Raider is to guide Lara through a series of tombs and other locations in search of treasures and artifacts. On the way, she must kill dangerous animals and other creatures, while collecting objects and solving puzzles to gain access to an ultimate prize, usually a powerful artifact.

The game was critically acclaimed and widely influential, it spawned a number of sequels and a franchise of related media.

name: Tomo Jam!
summary: TomoJam is a musical sandbox where up to 4 players can perform real MIDI songs using only their gamepads. Play, learn, and laugh as you hit (and miss) every note solo or together. Add your own MIDI files and explore a surprisingly deep, endlessly customizable way to make music and Jam with friends!

name: Top Driver
summary: The ultimate challenge of speed and skill

name: Totto's Magic Soup
summary: An item-mixing RPG filled with furry creatures

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KONT Airport
summary: Ontario International Airport (ONT) is a bustling transportation hub located in the heart of Southern California, just 35 miles east of downtown Los Angeles. Realistic modeling with over 50 custom modeled buildings, taxi signs, and amazing background scenery, buildings, roads developed by FeelThere.

name: Tower Hunter: Erza's Trial
summary: Tower Hunter: Erza's Trial contains core elements of roguelike and metroidvania-type games, presented in a toon render style. The player explores a mysterious tower with Erza, vanquishes mutant monsters and defeats bosses to acquire a Hunter's License and become the most powerful Battle Maiden.

name: Toll Booth Simulator: Schedule of Chaos
summary: You tried to escape prison but got caught. Instead of prison, they gave you a debt. Manage a toll booth on a desert highway. Check passports, take payments, and decide who passes. Grow fruit, mix cocktails, sell drinks, and dodge the cops. The only way to earn freedom is by paying off your debt.

name: Touhou Tenshiin: Celestial Examination Hall
summary: A fan-made 3D fighting game set in the Touhou Project universe! Unease once again shrouds Gensokyo, as terrifying rumors intertwine with the rising craze of 'Celestial Cultivation'!? End this chaos with dazzling combos and tactical mastery！

name: Touhou Quest: Mugen no Spellcard
summary: Suddenly, a mysterious fog rolls in and releases hordes of monsters from the dungeons. Accompanied by a group of party members, Reimu is out to save the land from peril. Mugen no Spellcard, literally translated as Spellcard of Infinity, is a traditional turn-based RPG, influenced by SaGa Series and Dragon Quest. Players control a party of characters that can walk into towns and buy items to defeat monsters outside of the towns. Touhou Quest features a skill tree, a tiered skill system that typically branches out into multiple paths, giving the character the ability to perform a new action or giving a boost to one of the character's stats. Skill trees also affect characters attributes such as magic points, weapons, gold, etc. The weapon synthesis system from Touhou Soujinengi is back, so that players can forge stronger weapons.

name: Toonix
summary: A simple game designed for children that allows them to customize a Toonix character. They can then take care of it as if it were a pet, play with it, etc. Includes many customization options including choices for the eyes, mouth, hairstyle, clothing, and accessories. Children will have tons of fun playing with it. Take photos of your Toonix and then save them on your phone so that you'll be able to remember your funniest designs.

name: Tormentis
summary:
Prepare your dungeon against intruders and protect your loot chests with monsters and well-placed traps. Train your hero, equip powerful gear and conquer other players' dungeons to fight your way to the top of the league.

Where classic action role-playing meets dungeon building. Your task is to protect your loot boxes from intruders. They supply you with coins and your opponents want to empty them!

Create a unique dungeon that will mislead your opponents. Place monsters and traps in your dungeon and lead your opponents into an ambush. They may not reach your treasury in time!

With every victory over another player you will receive trophies and rise in the rankings.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Season Pass Elegance
summary: This bundle includes Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- and all additional DLC.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KPVD Airport
summary: PVD airport for Tower! Simulator 3 is a mid-sized airport in Rhode Island, United States, located six miles south of Providence. With 22 gates and 2 runways, enough traffic to keep you busy, yet still relaxed controlling this airport.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KSAN Airport
summary: Flying into San Diego Airport for Tower! Simulator 3, the busiest single-runway airport. Originally known as Gibbs Field, opened in 1937. A state-of-the-art terminal inspired by the people and places to love about San Diego.

name: Touhou Genso Maroku: Utage
summary: Touhou Gensou Maroku Utage is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Strawberry Bose, which was released in Japan in 2012.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KCLE Airport
summary: Cleveland Hopkins International Airport (KCLE) is a significant commercial airport, being the largest and busiest airport in the state, developed by FeelThere for Tower! Simulator 3.

name: Tou Ikkyoku Gojyuusan Honba
summary: This is the first ever Mahjong game in which Mahjong tiles do not appear! Complete the mahjong hand by using the letters on the dice! Add dice, reroll dice, and use special moves and items like in a fighting game to win!

name: Touhou Gekkatan
summary: A doujin game by YuuYuutei based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Tower Command
summary: Tower Command is a roguelike tower defense with high level of strategy and tactics. Build towers to maximize bonuses and synergies to stop the endless horde of demons, beasts and undead. Unlock new commanders and upgrades, employ endless strategies to reach as far as you can.

name: Toy Story 3
summary: Get in on the game. Play as Buzz or Woody as you use your phonics skills to move your way around this interactive board game and compete in 16 challenging missions. Works with the Leapster Explorer and LeapPad Explorer systems.

name: Tooned Out Duo Dippin
summary: Welcome To Tooned Out Duo Dippin!!! This game is a body of work that has been painfully derived from years of suffering/studying Become A Monster Player! In this All Out Fantasy Arcade Racing heart pumping new franchise. Let your jaw drop as you duo dip through Pure Imagination and Hard work.

name: Total Arcade Racing
summary: Total Arcade Racing is a fun 2D top-down arcade racing game where you zip around closed circuits. Play solo or with up to 8 friends on the same screen in various game modes.

name: Toro to Kyuujistu
summary:
Toro on Holiday is a Video Game developed by Bomber Express and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

It was released on November 29, 2001 on the PlayStation 2. It is an exploration based game where the player travels through a Japanese town with Toro. It is most notable by its use of live footage for its environments.

name: Toaster Jam
summary: Fast paced breakfast themed arcade game with quirky puzzle elements

name: Toad Sama! & The Dicey World
summary:
Toad Sama! & The Dicey World is a fun and clever puzzle-strategy game where every tile you walk on looks and behaves like a face of a dice — and the dots are actually obstacles that block your movement!

You move one step at a time on a grid. On each tile, obstacles are placed exactly like the dots on a dice face (1 to 6). Your goal is to collect all the gold bags scattered across the board — but you’ll need to plan carefully, because the ground beneath you can change as you move.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 4
summary: "Special Music Pack Vol. 4" is a collection of arranged music selected by the development team that is fun to play with Spell Bubble!

name: Toys & Physics
summary: "Toys & Physics" is a side-view physics puzzle game. The goal is to collect stars and to get your ball to the basket.

name: Total War: Attila - Age of Charlemagne Campaign Pack
summary: Age of Charlemagne is an expansion for Total War: Attila, set in the Middle Ages on a sprawling new campaign map of Europe.

name: TowerMancer II
summary: TowerMancer Cards is a construction-based deckbuilder in which the player defends their tower from waves of enemies while using cards to build it. The player relies on imps to gather resources and on new rooms to unlock powers and attack enemies.

name: Total Football Management
summary: Total Football Management is a soccer manager game, putting the player in charge of a football club where the player makes decisions on what players to buy, stadium improvements, tactics, training and shares.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KBOS Airport
summary: IATA: BOS, ICAO: KBOS, FAA LID: BOS - main international airport serving the city of Boston. KBOS has six runways and four terminals (A, B, C and E). On average Boston experiences 950 aircraft movements each day, keeping you pretty busy in your controller seat!

name: Tomba! Special Edition: Whoopee Edition
summary: In Tomba! Special Edition, leap, bite, and throw your way across stunning 2.5D landscapes in this vastly-enhanced update to a platforming classic!

name: Toy Shop
summary: A simulation game where the player is tasked with managing a toy store.

name: Tony Hawk's Project 8
summary:
Tony Hawk's Project 8, officially abbreviated as THP8, is a skateboarding video game, the eighth installment in the Tony Hawk's series. It was released on PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 (developed by Neversoft) - a sixth-gen version was released on PlayStation 2, Xbox (Shaba Games) and PSP (Page 44 Studios). Unlike that version, this one features interconnected levels without any loading between them. The performance is inferior however, with the game targetting 30fps.

The game begins in the custom skater's hometown in surburbia. After breaking out into the main streets, a team is created by Tony Hawk. The team is called Project 8 and comprises eight skaters. The player character starts ranked 200th and by completing challenges and goals, it will improve his ranking constantly.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EDDF Airport
summary: IATA: FRA ; ICAO: EDDF - A major international airport located in Frankfurt, the fifth-largest city of Germany, main hub for Lufthansa. FRA is the busiest airport by passenger traffic in Germany as well as the 4th busiest in Europe, so be prepared to control some busy days here!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EHAM Airport
summary: Amsterdam airport appears in the top 5 airports in Europe in terms of passenger volume and number of flights. Check out the main airport in the Netherlands with Tower! Simulator 3 and challenge yourself with its 6 runways.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KATL Airport
summary: The busiest airport in the world, ATL shuttles people and goods across the nation and around the globe, on average, there are 2,700 arrivals and departures daily on five parallel runways. This airport has the tallest air traffic control tower in North America and is the fourth tallest in the world.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KSFO Airport
summary: KSFO - A major international airport and gateway to a lot of international destinations. This airport is the second busiest in CA after Los Angeles Airport and among the top 10 busiest airports in the U.S. Beautifully modelled and very unique tower building and surroundings, terminals.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KBNA Airport
summary: Control the sky on KBNA Nashville airport - Tower! Simulator 3. Detailed custom buildings with highly detailed texturesAirport taxi signsGround markingsDynamic lighting, light sources individually placed, for a spectacular night view experience.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: Miyo
summary: MIYO transforms your Tower! Simulator 3 sessions by giving you unprecedented control over visuals and weather alike. Tweak the lighting for stunning sunrise ops, or push your controlling skills with heavy rain and lower vis. With MIYO, the sky is no longer the limit—it’s whatever you want it to be.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KSLC Airport
summary: SLC for Tower! Sim 3 is a joint military/public airport, the 21st busiest airport in the United States with four runways, three air carrier runways and one general aviation runway. The airport complex is made up of one terminal, two concourses and 63 gates.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: CYYZ Airport
summary: Canada's busiest airport is a fine addition toy our Tower! catalog. By size it is one of the biggest also, five main runways and 30 taxiways will give you some challenge too.

name: Toy Monsters
summary:
Toy Monsters is a mixed-reality tabletop tower defense game inspired by other classic titles in the genre. Built from the ground up with hand tracking and mixed reality passthrough in mind.

Defend yourself against the hordes across 3 worlds, 33+ levels and bonus levels, bosses, and an endless mode.

As you progress through the levels, you'll unlock new toys with unique special powers. You can enhance your toys with magical potions and use crystal power to unleash magic beams from your hands, transform your fingers into flamethrowers, and more.

Defend against hordes of invading monsters by strategically placing magical toy defenders powered by star power. You will encounter a range of enemies, each with their unique abilities and weaknesses.

name: Touch Melbourne
summary: Explore the city of Melbourne through its various, tiny everyday interactions.

name: Total War: Warhammer - Grombrindal the White Dwarf
summary:
Grombrindal "The White Dwarf" is a brand new Legendary Lord for the Dwarfs. He is an enigmatic figure, recorded throughout the Dwarfs' history, appearing to give aid to his bearded kin whenever their situation becomes especially dire.

Like all Legendary Lords, Grombrindal unlocks a series of unique quests as he levels up, each of which rewards him with his legendary wargear. Grombrindal has no less than four quest-chains, bestowing him with the Rune Helm of Zhufbar, the Armour of Glimril Scales, the Rune Cloak of Valaya, and the Rune Axe of Grimnir. Thus clad, he is a formidable force of the battlefield.

name: Tower of Wishes 4: Shaka
summary: Rise as King Vusumuzi and ascend the legendary Tower of Wishes to save your kingdom.

name: Top Percent
summary: Top Percent is a Competitive Party Royale game that combines the excitement of battle royale with the joy of party games, offering players a thrilling and entertaining experience with diverse challenges and strategic gameplay. Join the fun, beat your foes and rise to the top in "Top Percent" today!

name: Touhou Crawl
summary: A Touhou derivative roguelike game. Conquer the dungeon-ified Gensokyo using items, faith, and tactics.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Dark Cherry Disc
summary: Dark cherry disc focus on the three main guys for entry no.7-9: Rudo Jesus (Entry no.7), Moroboshi Tetsu (Entry no.8), and Hamada Shinnosuke (Entry no.9)

name: Tower of Radia
summary:
Radia Senki: Reimeihen is a Tecmo-developed action RPG released for the Famicom exclusively in Japan. As an amnesiac, the player wanders around the game world with a party in tow as they fight monsters in real time and learn political secrets in the story.

Radia Senki: Reimeihan (literally "Chronicles of the Radia War: Dawn") is an action RPG developed by Tecmo for the Famicom. Only garnering an official release in Japan, Radia Senki puts players in the shoes of an amnesiac protagonist who can be named. While in search of his own memories, the protagonist soon encounters other characters such as Darth, a man out for revenge, and a mysterious princess and together they roam the game world in search of answers to various questions that plague their lives. As per the times in Tecmo's development antics, the game features cinematic cutscenes and musical stylings similar to that of their critically-acclaimed Ninja Gaiden.

Radia Senki features gameplay mechanics that are unconventional for its period, only being commonly adopted in strategy RPGs and other game types in later hardware generations. While there are fundamental RPG components in place such as equipment, shops, town exploration, and experience points, the actual combat takes place in real-time. The player only controls the protagonist directly, but can issue different strategic commands to other party members that, in turn, influence their AI as they fight. Furthermore, while fights do consist of random encounters, they take place on the same playing field as the game world itself, meaning that there are no transitions into battle-specific arenas like turn-based RPGs at the time such as Final Fantasy. Experience points are also gained in real-time as each character defeats enemies. When battles have concluded, the player receives complimentary items before being whisked back to the point on the map where they were walking prior to the fighting.

name: Touhou Multi Scroll Shooting
summary: A derivative work of Touhou Project. This game is also a derivative work of other derivative works. Play as Konpaku Youmu to fly and shoot enemies. You want vertical scroll or horizontal scroll ? This game give you both of them.

name: Tormented 12
summary:
A hero is born in biblical era.
The tribes of Israel are at war for their own survival.
How far would you go to save your people? How deep is your faith in God?Tormented12 is a historical fantasy game based on the biblical account of the twelve Hebrew tribes.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season 2: Keener's Legacy
summary: Keener’s Legacy is the second season coming to The Division 2. The first phase is now live, and we have a full breakdown of what’s waiting for you in Washington D.C. and New York. As in Season 1, the Manhunt of five Rogue Agents is the narrative driver. Looking for clues, locations and finding the Rogue agents to take on the Prime Target, Hornet. In the wake of Keener’s death his legacy is brought back to life, as the rogue agent Hornet leads a cell of zealous rogue associates, devoted to carry on Keener’s calamitous plans with the Eclipse virus. The Division must now take down each of the five members of Hornet’s rogue cell in order to prevent them from realizing what Keener failed to do.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season 3: Concealed Agenda
summary: Season 3: Concealed Agenda introduces new targets to hunt, new Leagues, new Global Events, and more.

name: Tokyo Satsujinki Gakkou no Kaidan
summary:
In a Japan where Amaterasu (good/happiness) and Aramatsuri (evil/misfortune) powers are contained within humans. The main character, Yuzuru Kurotori, is a civil servant working for the Tokyo Metropolitan Government. He belongs to the Aramatsuri Countermeasures Sector on the 7th Floor of the Tokyo Metropolitan Government Building.

Only those who can see and stand toe to toe with Aramatsuri belong to this department. Even in modern Japan, the Aramatsuri wander the streets of Tokyo…

name: To All of Mankind
summary: Set in Tokyo's Akihabara, an adventure game where a group of cheerful ladies enjoys a survival life with each other's company. Five girls in Akihabara abandoned for a long time. Without having anyone else around, they must be friendly and help each other while living happy days. In all times, they are honest and cheerful regardless of any situation. Be it from cooking together to bathing, relaxation, and all occasions to enjoy themselves to the fullest.

name: Tokyo 24-Ku
summary: In this visual novel, our protagonist, Akihiro Sonogi, is a promising young member of the House of Representatives aiming to be top of the faction. After a suspected terrorist bombing in Tokyo's Shibuya district, he was elected to tackle the case. An intricate drama depicting the love and hate relationships of Japan's greatly ambitious upper class thus begins!

name: Tomb Explorer VR
summary: Tomb Explorer VR is an adventure game where you navigate/explore ancient ruins and tombs in search of historical treasures, relics and artifacts.

name: Tongue of Dog
summary:
Play as a cute dog. Stick out your tongue to grab onto things. Overcome 8 unique levels: swing high, slide on ice, float in space, and escape from a volcano.
No checkpoints.
Collectibles and leaderboards included. Customize your character.
Climb, fall, die, rage, learn, and repeat.

name: Total Upheaval
summary:
Every decade, a list of the 100 Most Influential People is drafted up, with a heavy emphasis placed on those in the top 25. Dubbed MIRS (Most Influential 25) by the general populace, these selected few are invited to a conference by NEXT, the world's leading megacorporation. While the public eye becomes fixated on the NEXT World Conference, no one except the attendees will ever learn what happened behind these closed doors.

This leads to the conference becoming hijacked by an unknown party. Kidnapped, the attendees are whisked away to an abandoned university. Everyone wakes up discombobulated. Once bearings are found and introductions are made, the school's unusual principal finally reveals himself: Kingpen, the Crowned Al-Capone Penguin. Despite his cuddly looks, he thrusts the entire group into a no holds barred killing game.

Who will die? Who will survive? Who is pulling the strings? Why a penguin!?

name: Toad's Soul Hopper
summary: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Toad's Soul Hopper" is hopping action game where you aim for the top from bottom to top! Will he soar into action with weapons in hand to stop Anemone's mischief and save his friends?

name: Tomodachi Life
summary: Tomodachi Life is a communication game for the 3DS in which players can convert their Miis into Tomodachis (or create new ones) and put them in a wide range of scenarios ranging from charming to utterly ridiculous. A key feature of the game is its text-to-speech tech which outputs user generated text as computerized speech in seven languages (EFIGS, Japanese and Korean).

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Parade Pack
summary:
Keep the streets of New York safe with these prestigious suits and weapon skins. This bundle includes:

- Police Parade Set
- FNYC Parade Set
- Gemstone Amethyst Weapon Skin
- Glitch Barrium Weapon Skin
- Safari Monteverde Weapon Skin

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Liz Triangle Song Pack
summary:
To celebrate ten million views, we've included the hit track,
"Who Killed U.N.Owen," uncut and changed-up in tempo!
We've also included an all-original Touhou Gouyoku Ibun
arrangement of the tune, "Yok"!

name: Tonka Monster Trucks
summary: Choose your monster truck, choose from three tracks, and start your engine ! One track is for practice, the second track is especially designed for stunts and the last for races. The game features two modes, the usual quick start mode, and the professional mode. Choose the first mode if you only want to start driving as soon as possible. This is although the only mode in the game where you can play up to four players, one after the other. In the professional mode, you will have first to register, fine tune your monster truck, and start. You won't be able to play against friends but against the computer. There's also a track editor so you can design your own special track. Also in this mode, you will be able to print pictures of your truck and even, your driver's license.

name: Tokimeki Memorial: Forever with You - Emotional
Tokimeki Memorial 4
summary:
Tokimeki Memorial 4 is a dating sim developed and published by Konami, the fourth game in the Tokimeki Memorial series and also the first original game in the series to debut on a portable system.

The game celebrated the 15th anniversary of the Tokimeki Memorial franchise. A special edition package of the game included an OVA, the soundtrack, a character box, and sketches from the artists of the game. It also featured the return of the Tree of Legend from the first Tokimeki Memorial game, as well as the return of the Kirameki High school setting, set 15 years after the first game.

name: Toree Genesis
summary: A small(!) three level toree thing to celebrate the 31st birthday of that hedgehog.

name: Total War: Rome II - Hannibal at the Gates Campaign Pack
summary: Dropping you into the Western Mediterranean at the outbreak of the 2nd Punic War, Hannibal at the Gates features a new campaign map focused on the period that brought the ancient-world superpowers of Rome and Carthage to all-out war.

name: Touhou Tenkuushou: Hidden Star in Four Seasons
summary: Touhou Tenkuushou ~ Hidden Star in Four Seasons is the 16th game in the Touhou Project series. It was announced on the developer ZUN's blog on April 20, 2017. A playable demo was released on May 7, 2017, at Reitaisai 14, and the full version was released at Comiket 92 on August 11, 2017. The game was released on Steam worldwide on November 17, 2017, becoming the first game in the series to be available on the platform.

name: Touhou Hisoutensoku: Choudokyuu Ginyoru no Nazo wo Oe
summary:
Touhou Hisoutensoku: Choudokyuu Ginyoru no Nazo wo Oe is a standalone expansion pack to the fighting spinoff Scarlet Weather Rhapsody with five new characters, first released by Tasogare Frontier at Comiket 76. Combining this expansion with an installation of Scarlet Weather Rhapsody allows for the use of additional Touhou characters within the new expansion.

Like its predecessors, Immaterial and Missing Power and Scarlet Weather Rhapsody, Touhou Hisoutensoku is a collaboration between ZUN and Tasogare Frontier. Tasogare Frontier is well-known for games such as Eternal Fighter Zero, Immaterial and Missing Power and Scarlet Weather Rhapsody.

name: Tomb of the Dead
summary: Fight against endless waves of demons inside a flesh creature. Classic horde gameplay.

name: Torched
summary: Guide your torch across towns, solve clever grid-based challenges, and rise through the ranks as a paladin aspirant

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Burnt Horizon
summary: Rainbow Six goes to the land Down Under for Operation Burnt Horizon. Protection specialists with the SASR Mobility Platoon, Gridlock and Mozzie are assigned protection detail for a high-value convoy across sunburnt country. An unscheduled pit stop at a lonely petrol station turns into a standoff when their convoy is unexpectedly pinned down. Discover the new Outback service station map, where the red desert brings plenty of heat. Find more details in the full Patch Notes below, as well as many gameplay fixes implemented this Season.

name: Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica
summary: Touhou Perfect Sakura Fantastica brings the extremely popular Touhou series to arcades worldwide in a spectacular remake of Perfect Cherry Blossom (Touhou Episode 7). Featuring 4 playable characters and multiple difficulty levels in the original story, discover the mystery behind the long winter in the side story and epilogue modes.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Blood Orchid
summary: In Operation Blood Orchid, two Special Duties Unit Operators join Team Rainbow to raid Theme Park. This third season will showcase a reworking of the Operators and maps following an optimization of our data, namely a rework of textures, polished dynamic and static lighting, richer sky domes, new customization, and much more.

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing
summary: Built in collaboration with 3 time NASCAR Cup Series Champion and 2020 NASCAR Hall of Fame Inductee Tony Stewart, All-American Racing features an all new physics engine with US Legend Cars, Street Stocks, and Big-Block Modifieds along with 26 brand new dirt tracks!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Demon Veil
summary: Rainbow Six Siege introduces the first season of Year 7, Demon Veil! It features Azami, a new Defender from Japan, a brand new map, a permanent game mode: Team Deathmatch, and more. Azami can shut down sightlines, block off entry points, and create entirely new angles of defense all with a flick of her wrist.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: High Calibre
summary:
Rainbow Six Siege introduces the fourth season of Year 6, High Calibre! Our newest Operator, Thorn, joins Rainbow as a Technical Weapons Expert from Ireland's Emergency Response Unit. Never one to back down from a challenge, her strength and leadership set a new course for Rainbow. Her Razorbloom Shell proximity grenade is as sharp as her temper.

This season we've integrated some select updates including Team Colors, a Bulletproof Camera Rework and changes on the Test Server. We're bringing balance to Finka, Drone Counters, Elite 2.0, and more! Read the Patch Notes below for full details.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Wind Bastion
summary:
New to Rainbow Six are Kaid and Nomad for Operation Wind Bastion. These two Operators are right at home at the reputable Kasbah Sekhra Mania, the featured Fortress map in Morocco. Join the very best at this elite training ground.

Year Three Season Four will also introduce Pro Team BDUs and Headgears, a new navigational display in the shop, and a new fullscreen view for the weapons. You will find more details on these updates in the full Patch Notes below, as well as many gameplay fixes implemented this Season.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Crystal Guard
summary:
Introducing Crystal Guard, Rainbow Six Siege's third season of Year 6! This season, we're introducing our latest Operator, Osa, an engineering prodigy from Croatia who brings expertise to Nighthaven with her quick wits and unapologetic enthusiasm for '60s sci-fi movies.

This season is packed with a plethora of updates including changes to Operator armor and DBNO scoring as well as balancing for Twitch, IQ, Mute, and Fuze. Players also have a new way to customize Elite Uniforms.

name: Tokyo Drive
summary: Tokyo Drive is a racing game that uses the location data of actual roads and buildings in Tokyo, Japan (Tokyo's 23 wards).

name: Tokyo 24-Ku: Inoru
summary: Tokyo 24-Ku: Inoru is a visual novel video game developed by HolicWorks and published by dramatic create.

name: Total Driftin': Touge Dreams
summary: Master each corner, burn rubber, and become a legend high in the Japanese mountains. Total Driftin': Touge Dreams is a tribute to classic '90s drifting, with precise physics, retro aesthetics, and a cult-like soul. Do you have what it takes to become a touge god?

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KAUS Airport
summary: Austin airport is the third busiest in Texas, and the 28th busiest in the US. As of 2023, total of 18741 flights passed through Austin airport.

name: Touch Detective
summary: In Touch Detective you will become Mackenzie, a fledgling detective, and solve various mysteries in a "Touch Adventure"!

name: Touhou 1: The Highly Responsive to Prayers NES Demake
summary:
From the programmer that brought you Chuhou Joutai, Drillimation Systems brings you a port of the game that helped kickstart a global internet sensation.

Once upon a time, there were two races that ruled over Gensokyo (The Land of Illusions): humanoids and youkai. They both helped bring peace to the world. One day, war broke out between the two races. The humanoids were largely unsuccessful, as the youkai dominated over Gensokyo. During the battle, an important landmark in the eastern part of the land was destroyed: the Hakurei Shrine.

Underneath the rubble, a young shrine maiden named Reimu Hakurei emerges. You are destined to go out and punish the one responsible. But, there are two paths to take. Armed with a mighty wand, an infinite supply of throwing amulets, and a yin-yang orb, you must make your way across the Aetherworld (Makai) or the Netherworld (Jigoku). But, once you meet the Angel of Death, be sure to keep your stake sharp. And say your prayers!

Original by Team Shanghai Alice, adaptation by Drillimation Systems.

name: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side: 3rd Story
summary: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side: 3rd Story is the third game in the series. It features a whole new colorful cast of characters and storyline and like the previous games in the series, 3rd Story starts off with a heroine who is just beginning to enter Habataki High School.

name: Toraware no Palm: Refrain
summary: A dramatic, romance suspense story.

name: Tooki
summary: The most fun and addictive Puzzle Game in eons! Help Tooki Push, Kick and explode his way across 5 unique and beautiful Worlds. Solve 125 challenging Puzzles with different foes and dangers to overcome on every world.

name: Town Survival
summary:
Mayors, welcome to Town Survival: Zombie Games, a survival and town-building simulation game themed in zombie catastrophe.
Virus leaked...zombies mutated...Mayors, now is your time to rebuild the town destoryed by zombies and protect residents. Make sure your residents stay survival!

name: Total Tiki-Taka
summary:
A one touch endless football game based on combined styles of Total football and Tiki-Taka.
Total Tiki-Taka is a fast paced, fresh take on football games. With combined elements of Tiki-Taka soccer and Total football, this game will stretch your concentration powers to the limit.
Take control of your favorite teams and master the art of passing in this frantic passing game. Total Tiki-Taka puts you on the football training grounds where real players are made. Keep passing the ball among the players to keep the session going and bettering your score. Like Total football, the players will keep changing their positions so keep an eye out on their movements.

name: Tower Defense
summary: Protect the castle towers from dark forces. Use a battle mage and bonuses. Upgrade weapons and bonuses.

name: Toxic
summary: Toxic is a savage, multiplayer, loot-driven ARPG set in the blistering aftermath of the end times. Battle through toxic desert wastelands, mutated jungles and swamps, driving back hordes of zombies, mutants and ruthless raider clans — on foot and behind the wheel of heavily-armed war machines.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 1
summary:
Extra Song Pack with 25 songs that include the original "Love-colored Master Spark"
This is additional content that enables the following songs:
- POKER FACE
- Paranoia
- Trance Dance Anarcky
- The Karasu Wind
- SACRIFICE
- Museimei Saafesu
- PanneDemonology
- Christmas Bomb!!

name: Tokeijikake no Ley Line: Tasogaredoki no Kyoukaisen
summary: First game in visual novel series Tokeijikake no Ley Line.

name: Toy Story 2: Woody Sousaku Daisakusen!!
summary: Minigame collection based on Toy Story 2.

name: Toy Cowboy Royale: RPG Dragon's Challenge
summary: Embark on an epic toy cowboy adventure.Battle legendary dragons and claim your glory.

name: Total War Saga: Thrones of Britannia - Blood, Sweat and Spears
summary: Rule Britannia with a bloodied iron fist and experience the true brutality of war. Blood, Sweat and Spears adds ultra-violence and gore to Total War Saga: Thrones of Britannia.

name: Touhou Fumo Racing
summary: Embody a Fumo and compete on a wacky karting race against other fumo-fied Touhou Characters! Play alone against AI-controlled racers or with up to 4 friends on splitscreen multiplayer.

name: Tower of Jank
summary: Create game-breaking card combos to survive relentless hordes. Tower of Jank is a chaotic top-down action roguelite card-battler where you build overpowered decks, collect relics, and fight through ever-harder stages. You can stop time to plan your moves or let your cards play automatically.

name: Toilet Boom
summary: Explore the bunker with monsters and find the coolest weapons! Action Roguelike

name: Together in Forgotten Lands
summary: Two souls, one destiny. Embark on a co-op adventure through a forgotten land, where teamwork and wit are the only way to navigate the wonders and dangers of a magical cave.

name: Top Gun Air Combat
summary: Nato armies are engaged in a 21th century conflict against Russian Federation Army. As a Top Gun Pilot from US Air Force, you fly the best American Fighters (F18, F35, F22...) through multiple missions across battlefields around the world (Cuba, Lebanon, Ukraine...) in cooperation with your European Allies Aircrafts (Typhoon, Rafale, Mirage...). You will be engaged in air combat against Russian Fighters (Mig 27, Mig 33, Su 37...). Lock your targets, choose amongst different missile systems and riffle, shoot and forget! Powered by a very realistic physic engine that makes the game highly playable, Top Gun Air Combat will make you feel real sensations of modern air combat.

name: Tombstone City
summary:
"One of the best TI99/4A games ever!" - Chris Forrest

Aliens called "Morgs" are invading the old west. You must destroy them by shooting them from your "schooner". When you kill them, they turn into cactuses which create obstacles on the map. But if you kill a Morg while it is adjacent to an existing cactus, the Morg and the cactus are both eliminated from the map.

Tombstone City was known as Saguaro City in Prototype but was later changed. TI released the source code to this game as part of its Editor/Assembler package.

name: Top Torch
summary: When the torches touch, the top torch wins. Fly with finesse to defeat your friends.

name: Toy Warfare
summary: Take the auto-battle sim genre and add a splash of ridiculous by adding dozens of cute and vicious toys to the fray! Pack your army of toys with action figures, remote control cars, cuddly bears and many more before sending them into battle to win gold and glory in Toy Warfare!

name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE: 3 Support Quest Set
summary: A set of additional Idolasphere worlds where to gain experience, gather items and train units. The pack contains the Mirage Hunter Idolasphere, the Mirage Hunter Idolasphere and the Mirage Hunter (Savage Festival) Idolasphere.

name: Total War: Warhammer Trilogy
summary:
Explore, expand and conquer a rich fantasy world with legions of mighty heroes or hordes of monstrous units under your command in the Total War: Warhammer Trilogy, bundled at a discount for the very first time.

Boasting all 3 base games, summon the elector counts as the Empire in Total War: Warhammer, burrow beneath your foes to establish secret undercities as the Skaven in Total War: Warhammer II, or spread deadly plagues to weaken your opponents as Nurgle in Total War: Warhammer III.

With this legendary bundle, carry all 16 races from the Trilogy into Total War: Warhammer III's Immortal Empires, and conquer one of the grandest strategy campaigns ever conceived, utilising each race’s unique sets of campaign mechanics, legendary lords, and battle possibilities.

name: Touchstarved
summary: You were born cursed, with hands that twist the mind of any human you touch. Desperation leads you to the shadowy city of Eridia, where your fate intertwines with 5 monstrous strangers. Each can offer you salvation or damnation. Find a cure for your curse in Touchstarved, a gothic horror romance visual novel.

name: Top Speed: Drag & Fast Racing
summary: Beat criminal overlords and become the biggest fish in the city. Head out and race as fast as you can. Choose any car you want from an astounding selection of 69 cars - you can drive classic stock rides, new heavily modded dragsters, and even national police vehicles from 5 different countries.

name: Tomodachi Collection
summary: Tomodachi Collection takes place on an island in the middle of the sea, that can be populated with various Miis created from the built in Mii Maker, or transferred wirelessly from a Wii console. These Miis can be given a personal voice and personality based on the player's liking.

name: Touge R
summary: A drifting-focused racing game for Xbox that pits players in narrow mountain pass (touge) duels. Emphasizing precision driving and car tuning, Touge R was only released in Japan.

name: Toaplan Arcade Collection 4
summary: Toaplan Arcade 4 for Evercade brings together 6 more all-action arcade hits from the beloved Japanese developer Toaplan. Blast off for explosive action in the shoot ’em ups Dogyuun and Grind Stormer, enjoy cartoony platform fun in Snow Bros. 2 and Pipi and Bibi’s, and hit the streets in the wrestling-themed beat ’em up Knuckle Bash.

name: To the Core
summary:
To The Core is an incremental game about drilling and using the resources from the planets in the solar system, buy upgrades to drill even further and deeper than before!

A solar system awaits you, plenty of planets to choose from to find and drill their resources, however be careful to not waste any fuel if you wish to drill more of that resource.

Travel the expansive solar system to find planets with varying resources,
each planet is stronger than the last so you'll need to gather upgrades.

name: Total Tank Simulator 2
summary:
A physics-driven, derpy battle simulator of total destruction. Build cross-era lineups, command your army in RTS mode, or jump into any unit directly. Play unique campaigns or just relax and watch the chaos unfold. Make a mess — then drive through it. The continuation of Total Tank Simulator returns with even more mayhem.

Total Tank Simulator 2 is an advanced physics-based battle sandbox where every structure, terrain element, and unit breaks into hundreds of pieces. Cities crumble, tanks shred, forests splinter — everything is destroyable. History, sci-fi, and fantasy collide as you build dream (or nightmare) matchups: WW2 armor vs aliens, cyclops vs cyborgs, laser dinos vs anything you dare throw at them.

name: Tony and Jennie
summary: Tony and Jenny are 3D platformer games that move cute characters. It comes with a fairytale background and sound. It has a difficult difficulty level, so you can play it interestingly. Now, let's go on a trip!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown is a mobile game in the Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Franchise based on Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Lockdown. Developed by Gameloft, it features gameplay similar to other mobile titles in the franchise but retains the overall story of its console counterpart. The game takes place in 2007, which in the plot echoes the events of Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Vegas (Mobile).

name: To Crime Nirvana
summary: A simple RPG Maker VX Ace game where a former gangster, his demon worshipper boyfriend and their cat fight annoying crooks.

name: Tom & Jerry in Dynamice
summary:
Ever wondered what happens when you mix cats and explosives? No? Good! That would be nasty.

Instead, do it the safe way. Become a well-armed mouse and join Jerry as he battles through a bomb-based war of attrition, getting rid of Tom and his catty cronies who took over his house and kidnapped all his mates whilst he was off enjoying a well-deserved holiday.

Oh well, you know what they say – whilst the mouse is away, the cats will play!

Bombs awaaaaaaay!

name: Tower Brawl
summary: Tower Brawl is a casual and competitive game that combines elements of tower defense, real-time strategy and card genres.Instead of the usual tower defense games, Tower Brawl features an original siege theme and a variety of personality-filled heroes with synergies and counters between their abilities and classes. Featured an original siege theme and tons of colorful heroes which belong to different classes, crushing enemies through synergy. Tower Brawl promotes an environment full of variables with random card draws in the battle to keep you and your opponent on your toes! In this exciting game, players will enjoy a powerful balance between strategy and randomness.

name: Tokusou Kidoutai J-SWAT
summary: Tokusō Kidōtai JSWAT is a police-themed, first-person shooter with live-action cutscenes and digitized graphics. For each mission, the player must select a weapon loadout and attempt to neutralize all threats. While lethal force is available as an option, subduing and arresting criminals is the preferred approach, and is reflected as such in mission rankings. The player must also be careful not to harm hostages and civilians, and pay attention to instructions received over radio during each mission.

name: Tony Hawk's Proving Ground
summary:
Tony Hawk's Proving Ground is a sequel to Tony Hawk's Project 8, this time letting the player be able to choose their own storyline by making different choices during the game with the ability to skate in Philadelphia, Baltimore, and Washington D.C.

There are four different classes of skaters (Rigger, Hardcore, Career and Street), which influences the story's direction. It also features an expanded Nail-the-Trick system with moves such as Nail-the-Grab and Nail-the Manual, Bowl Carving, Aggro Push, Skate Checking, Climbing/Exploration, Environment Altering, and Rig-a-Kit.

During the game the player can get advice from professional skaters to help mold their own created skater and learn new moves and tricks and has the ability to create their own skate park.

Unlike the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions, the PlayStation 2 and Wii editions do not offer online multiplayer but still share the main story. Gameplay is however much different on the PlayStation 2 using the analog controller while the Wii uses the remote and nunchuk during certain motions to pull off various tricks. There are also different characters in these versions.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2
summary: A new 20-minute holiday special taking place at Sigmund Corp, where Neil and Eva work.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Velvet Shell
summary: In Operation Velvet Shell, two G.E.O. Operators join Team Rainbow to regain control of the "Coastline". Following a year of post-launch content, this major update aims to improve player comfort with an upgraded navigation interface, customisation selections and lots more.

name: Toy Trains
summary: Let’s play Toy Trains! A playful track-building VR game where you create your own small world and engage in a captivating storyline. It’s all about imagination, creative thinking, having fun and… trains!

name: Toem
summary:
An aesthetic adventure with the premise of enjoying the little things!
Toem is an adventure game, it aims to capture the curiosity of a child! Should I go left, right, who cares I'm on an adventure! Your smile, that's what's important to us.

name: Toolbox Tycoon
summary: Build and manage your own trade business in a dynamic city sim. Hire staff, assign jobs, upgrade your HQ, and compete with rival companies in this fast-paced business management game.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater
summary: Take control of real skaters and perform strings of crazy tricks in the first entry of the long-running Tony Hawk skateboarding series.

name: Totally Rad Metal Detector League
summary: With nothing but the hum of your metal detector for company, explore in splendid isolation for that hidden treasure. Share that unique blend of tranquillity and anticipation with friends in online co-op - or dial up the intensity and race rivals to totally rad treasures in this metal detecting sim!

name: ToHeart2: AnotherDays
summary: ToHeart2: AnotherDays is a spin-off from ToHeart2, taking place sometime after the events of the original game, its main storyline allows the player to pursue seven heroines consisting of both supporting female characters from To Heart 2 and new characters. In addition, it also contains two additional scenarios that extend storylines from the original game.

name: Touhou Fairy Knockout: One Fairy to Rule Them All
summary: A game where multiple players co-fight or compete against each other! You will role-play as playful fairies with unique personalities, and accomplish your own Gekokujō in Gensokyo where the strong gather! Make your own favorite fairy character the strongest with your own hands!

name: Totoball
summary:
Totoball, also known as table football, is a football-inspired game. In it players have to pull, push and spin the soccer players
that are stuck in cross bars, a simple game that can give you lots of fun times with your friends

name: Tong
summary: Tong is a PvP game where you have to lick more objects than your opponent!

name: Tora's Garden
summary: Catch fish, collect bugs, find furniture and help the locals as you create your sanctuary on a dying world.

name: Touhou Monster TD: Dr.Cirno
summary:
Add a usable character Dr. Cirno into the game.
Add two usable tower Letty and Daiyousei.

name: To the Stars
summary: Explore a strange galaxy, recruit funky aliens and discover weird worlds! Fight off hostile warships in exciting and easy-to-understand space combat! Most importantly, give your flock of gullible tourists the space tour of a lifetime…

name: Toska
summary: A cozy 2D exploration game. Venture into abandoned buildings, uncover lost secrets, read people's mail, meet interesting characters, and find something nice for your mom.

name: Tom Clancy's H.A.W.X 2
summary: Aerial warfare has evolved. So have you. As a member of the ultra-secret H.A.W.X. 2 squadron, you are one of the chosen few. One of the truly elite. You will use finely honed reflexes, bleeding-edge technology and ultra-sophisticated aircraft – their existence denied by many governments – to dominate the skies.

name: Tokyo College Girls: The Nerd & Queen Bees
summary: A 30-day romance simulation game where you spend your college life with female students.

name: TopSpin 2K25
summary: The worlds of tennis and 2K have collided. TopSpin 2K25 is the next must-play sports game from 2K that fully immerses fans in the world of tennis. For more information on TopSpin 2K25, including release date, game features and more, stay tuned.

name: Tobichiyon X
summary: Tobichiyon X is an Azumanga Daioh fan-game featuring Chiyo as the protagonist and Chiyo-Father as every enemy encountered in the game. It is a shoot-em-up primarily drawing inspiration from Ikaruga. The scoring system follows the player collecting star drops from enemies killed, these stars double as points and also bomb usage. Players must collect stars one after another without allowing them to fall off-screen to chain points together, doubling until the player reaches the star cap before resetting. It is vital that the player carefully chooses which enemies to kill as killing the wrong enemy will lead to stars falling out of reach, thus resetting the counter. Certain mini-boss like enemies will drop 3 stars upon death, with each star retaining the current score multiplier.

name: Toy Home: Second Gear Pack
summary:
Download this Toy Home: Second Gear expansion pack to experience madcap racing on a while new scale.

Featuring 6 new vehicles - including the mighty monster truck - plus 6 new courses set in a girly bedroom and family living room, this pack takes Toy Home's clockwork car craziness to new extremes.

name: Tomes and Quests: A Word RPG
summary: An upcoming fantasy role-playing game with a word game twist, Tomes and Quests is a whole new take on puzzlers. Three friends have become trapped in a book. The upside is they now have amazing new abilities that are powered by words! Solve word puzzles, battle evil, level up, and save the worlds.

name: Total War: Rome II - Culture Pack: Pirates and Raiders
summary: Become the scourge of the ancient world with the Total War: Rome II - Pirates & Raiders Culture Pack. Introducing a new playable culture consisting of three new raiding-focused factions, Pirates & Raiders brings new buildings, technologies, religion, faction traits, battlefield and naval units to Total War: Rome II.

name: Torcurus
summary: Play as a turtle in this retro inspired adventure game! After you was born you found strange shrimp, that starts your adventure.

name: Toro to Typing
summary: Toro to Typing is a typing-based adventure game based on the Japanese PlayStation game Doko Demo Issyo. The game series concept of communicating with and teaching a virtual pet-type character is integrated with typing prompts.

name: Touhou Asked
summary: This quiz game is themed on the Eastern Project, but it is different from the usual quiz games and is tailored to Oriental needs.

name: To the Core
summary:
To the Core is a roguelite action-platforming speedrunner.
Run, jump and dash your way through levels filled with obstacles and hazards. Fight through heaps of enemies to save your father and set record times.

name: Toontown Rewritten: Sellbot Task Force
summary:
Sellbot Task Force adds over 50 new ToonTasks, a new area to explore, a fully remastered battle system, dozens of new Toon customization options, and the long-awaited Sellbot Field Offices: the most challenging Boss Cog that Toontown has ever faced.

This expansion marks a major milestone for Toontown Rewritten, being the first major content update for endgame players since before the original game's closure in 2013. It was developed entirely as a volunteer effort, and is being released for free without any form of subscriptions, advertisements, micro-transactions, donations, or other forms of revenue.

name: ToWhere?
summary: A 2D sandbox focused on exploration and automation. Construct production chains, optimize resource flow, and discover hidden mechanics shaping a self evolving world. Please don't fall that would be bad for your bones actually.

name: Toontown Rewritten: Under New Management
summary:
Under New Management is Toontown Rewritten's major update that was released as the 4.0.0 update on May 24, 2024, during ToonFest: The Great Fanfair. It was announced on May 26, 2023, during ToonFest: Birthday Bash, with a breaking newscast from COG-TV announcing a management shakeup at Cogs, Incorporated. The update is comprised of four new sinister Supervisor Cogs, revamped Cog facilities, Version 2.0 Cog Disguises, and new cosmetics.

Various observational analyses were conducted by the Cogs throughout February 2024 to monitor and evaluate the performance of the new Supervisor Cogs. Toontown community members were able to playtest the Under New Management update and provide feedback before public launch.

name: Tom the Postgirl
summary: Take a ride with Tom through her village and discover a great deal—perhaps too much—about the locals. Her approach, although controversial, is highly effective: intense and obsessive stalking.

name: Tomorrow's Love Puzzle
summary: Play as 'Ming Tian' in a romantic game, where you meet six unique women. From dominant to innocent, mysterious, dignified, cheerful, to clingy, your choices determine Ming Tian's love story. Who will he choose? You decide.

name: Tokimeki Factory Vol.1
summary:
Tokimeki Factory is a storytelling game developed by ActMind and published by Konami for PC and MacOS. The game allows players to create and write their own scenarios featuring one of six boys. Players can customize the backgrounds, boys' clothes, dialogue, and music. Over 1,000 lines of voiced dialogue were recorded for the game.

It was split into two volumes (Tokimeki Factory Vol. 1 and Tokimeki Factory Vol. 2), each featuring different characters. A complete box set featuring both volumes was also released.

name: To the Moon and Beyond
summary: In this single player card based game, you get to manage and build up your own space program. Your goal is to build all 8 mission critical objectives to safely send humans to the Moon and establish a permanent Moon habitat. You do this by determining what research to fund on the space station and what projects you want to fund back on Earth. Conducting research on the space station can reduce the cost of some projects or give you the ability to fund others. Results from the projects you fund determine your budget for the next year and get you closer to building your very own custom Rocket, Space Suit, Lunar Space Station, Moon Habitat, and more. Everything you do affects the outcome of your eight part program. But beware, events can happen that can influence that outcome. Will you be able to complete all of your eight mission objectives in four short years?

name: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland: Collector's Edition
summary:
Now you can cruise through LA without loading levels or stopping gameplay in Tony Hawk's American Wasteland. You can skate or BMX through a new story mode that takes you through all-new skate areas using tricks that have never appeared in previous Tony Hawk games. The cash that you earn can be used to customize your equipment and your skater by going to tattoo parlors and skate shops. Tony Hawk's American Wasteland also includes a classic mode that features classic Tony Hawk Pro Skater maps and objectives.

Included in this edition:
- Tony Hawk's American Wasteland
- Two exclusive classic mode levels
- Two exclusive secret characters
- The "Making of Tony Hawk's American Wasteland" documentary
- A concept art gallery featuring creations by legendary artist Jimbo Philips

name: Total War: Medieval III
summary:
We’ve been waiting a long time to say this: Total War is going back to the medieval era ⚔️ Total War: MEDIEVAL III is now in early development!

This isn’t just a sequel; it’s the rebirth of historical Total War. And we're bringing you on the journey with us.

name: Toaplan Arcade 4
summary: Toaplan Arcade 4 for Evercade brings together 6 more all-action arcade hits from the beloved Japanese developer Toaplan. Blast off for explosive action in the shoot ’em ups Dogyuun and Grind Stormer, enjoy cartoony platform fun in Snow Bros. 2 and Pipi and Bibi’s, and hit the streets in the wrestling-themed beat ’em up Knuckle Bash.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Tides of Torment
Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Seirensen Arrangements Pack
summary: This pack consists only of "Touhou Seirensen" arranged music!

name: Tokyo Psychodemic
summary: Through forensic investigation, confront paranormal phenomenas! 2D × Cinematic・Realistic forensics investigation simulation game.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Fujinroku Arrangements Pack
summary: This “Touhou Fujinroku Arrangements Pack” contains brand new arrangements of six popular Touhou Fujinroku songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Top Gun
summary:
Top Gun was released in 1987 for the PC, Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum and Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) (with an equivalent version for Nintendo Vs. Series arcade cabinets). The Commodore and Spectrum versions were developed by Ocean while Thunder Mountain handled the PC version of the game. Konami developed the Nintendo version. The NES version was released on November 1987 in North America, December 11, 1987 in Japan and on November 30, 1988 in Europe and Australia. According to Game Over by David Sheff, the NES version sold over 2 million copies.

Many of the people who've played the NES version have complained about the difficulty, and lack of action in the game.

The NES version had a sequel called Top Gun: The Second Mission.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Honey Milk Disc
summary: Honey Milk disc focus on the three main guys for entry no. 1-3: Ninomiya Yuuto (Entry no.1), Misaki Kotarou (Entry no.2), and Momose Ayumu (Entry no.3)

name: Tokimeki Factory Vol.2
summary:
Tokimeki Factory is a storytelling game developed by ActMind and published by Konami for PC and MacOS. The game allows players to create and write their own scenarios featuring one of six boys. Players can customize the backgrounds, boys' clothes, dialogue, and music. Over 1,000 lines of voiced dialogue were recorded for the game.

It was split into two volumes (Tokimeki Factory Vol. 1 and Tokimeki Factory Vol. 2), each featuring different characters. A complete box set featuring both volumes was also released.

name: To Dust
summary:
To Dust is the second interactive sci-fi adventure comic set in the world of The Botanist.
In this volume the Botanist searches the spirit world for answers to the disappearance of a fellow scientist.
This is a linear story that takes approximately 15-20 minutes to complete.

name: Toasterball
summary:
A ball, two goals and... toasters! Welcome to Toasterball.

Play against your friends in this physics-based multiplayer sports game, where toasters are athletes, bread flies everywhere and the gameplay changes every time you score a goal!

Toasterball is a multiplayer physics-based sports game, quick to learn and perfect for good old game nights on a couch with friends (1-4 players local multiplayer). Because you are playing as toasters, you can naturally expect some chaotic physics, random situations, electrical hazard, and more burnt toasts than you can ever imagine. There is also a real learning curve, with pro moves and enough gameplay variants to keep on surprising you for hours.

name: Tokimeki Factory Complete Box: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side
summary: A bundle of both Tokimeki Factory Vol 1 & 2.

name: Toon Tastic
summary:
ToonTastic is a compilation of games and cartoons. This product comes on two double sided DVDs and contains nineteen games for PC, each based on one of Cartoon Network's shows and originally available for free on their websites, together with six cartoons.

Disc One contains these cartoons: Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: Dinner Is Swerved; Ben 10: Lucky Girl; My Gym Partner's a Monkey; and Shark Attack/Me Adam You Jake together with the following games:

- Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: Door To Door - This is a Concentration type of game in which the player has to open doors and find matching pairs of friends within a time limit.
- Ben 10: Get It Together - This is a set of seven simple jigsaws featuring various cartoon characters that are on the DVD
- The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy: The Fright Before Christmas. Santa's home is invaded by bad toys. The team of Billy, Mandy & Grim help by shooting the bad toys and collecting the bits. The player can swap between characters and at the end of the level they can upgrade the weapons
- Courage The Cowardly Dog: Nightmare Vacation - A top down shooter. Muriel has been captured by natives and lava monsters. This is a job for Courage The Cowardly Dog who flies in and zaps the baddies with snowballs.
- Johnny Bravo: Whuzzat - Johnny Bravo is on a TV show called 'Whuzzat' which is a Simon kind of game. The game is played on a 3x3 grid where each cell has a picture and a sound associated with it. the game lights a sequence of cells which the player has to replicate. This process is repeated until the player makes an error at which point their/Johnny Bravo's prize is revealed
- Dexter's Laboratory: Red Eye Fight - a sort of Space Invaders game. Dexter moves left/right across the bottom of the screen shooting bouncing red eyeballs.
- Camp Lazlo: Paintcan Panic - The player uses the arrow keys to control Lazlo who is running around the screen with a paint pot. As he runs he spills paint. The objective is to cover a specified percentage of the screen in order to advance to the next level. If caught Lazlo loses paint from his pot and may be unable to complete the level.
- Codename Kids Next Door: Tummy Trouble - An odd top down shooter. Grandma Stuffem is making the world's kids too fat. The objective is to enter her lair, fight through multiple rooms populated with hostile food items and stop her. The mouse is used to aim the weapon and the arrow keys navigate.
- Ed, Edd 'n' Eddy: Candy Factory - The machine in the Candy Factory has malfunctioned. The player must shoot the right coloured sweet into the right barrel to make sweets.

Disc Two contains these cartoons: Powerpuff Girls: The Mane Event; Ed, Edd 'n' Eddy: Sir Ed a Lot; Dexter's Laboratory: and Dexter Dodgeball plus the following games;

- The Grim Adventures of Billy & Mandy: Zap To It. The player can play as either character. Billy has made a mess and it must be cleaned up before his dad gets home using a magic spell. Along the bottom of the screen are a series of arrows, as each symbol reaches the window on the right the player has to press the corresponding arrow key
- Megas XLR: Chase Masters - This is a bit like an old fashioned race game that could be found on a ZX Spectrum or C64. It's a top down keyboard controlled racer
- Cow and Chicken: Ballet Parking - Using their car the player has to crash into other cars so that they end up in their correct parking bays within the time limit.
- Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends: Wilt's Wash'N'Swoosh - A basketball game but instead of putting balls through hoops the player is putting washing into front loading washing machines.
- Samurai Jack: Code Of The Samurai - A platform runny, jumpy, fighty game set underground. When a level is completed the player gets a code which they can use when they replay/restart the game.
- Codename Kids Next Door: Code Breaker - another Simon style game. The kids are chasing a baddie down a tunnel. They need to enter the code to open the door, when they do they see the baddie just as he closes another door so they need to enter the code to open the door, when they do they see the baddie just as he closes another door.
- Hi Hi Puffy Ami Yumi: Dish It Out - One of the girls is really messy and has let the bands van fill up with mouldy left over food. The girls decide to clean the van with 'The Power Of Rock'. As the music plays, the food leaves the van heading towards a bin, each piece of food is either green, blue or pink. Along the bottom of the screen are three turntables coloured likewise. As a piece of food gets close to the bin, it can be made to jump in by clicking on the correct record.
- The Powerpuff Girls: Snowball Crush - Mojo Jojo is trying to cause an avalanche by sending big snowballs down a hill at a ski village. The player, who can play as any of the three girls, zaps the snowballs with laser vision.
- I Am Weasel: Beat The Heat - Guide an ice cream van to the crowds of waiting customers. There's only a few problems though - the driver can only turn left. Without a vendor's license, the player needs to avoid the police.
- Ben 10: Power Splash - Ben's friend is captured by some baddies on a motor boat. ben gives chase first as a fish and then as a giant wasp.

All games have title screens, instructions and sound effects, they play either in full screen or windowed modes.

name: Tower Deckfense
summary: Tower Deckfense is an exciting blend of tower defense and deck building. Build your deck strategically, upgrade your towers, and equip them with powerful modifiers to discover the best combinations and devastate your enemies.

name: Toxic Crusaders
summary:
It's Clean Up Time!

Only a complete and helpless nerd like Melvin Junko could be such a klutz that he would run into a vat of Grossolium 90, a terribly toxic waste by-product of the Island City Chemical Plant. Now the wimpy nerd Melvin has mutated into Toxie, a hideously deformed creature of super-human size and strength. But all is not lost, Toxie, with his newfound power, has joined forces with Major Disaster, Nozone, Headbanger, and Junkyard to form the Toxic Crusaders.
