No, not the ultimate heavy metal band, you moron! This motley crew is sworn to defend Tromaville and the rest of the U.S. from the polluting ways of Dr. Killemoff and his Radiation Rangers!

It won't be any easy mop up operation, but with your help the Toxic Crusaders are sure to make a clean sweep of the six levels of sludge, slime, goop and grime, while washing Killemoff and his filthy friends off the face of the earth forever!

name: Toree 2
summary: Toree 2 is the sequel to Toree 3D. A bite-sized 3D Platformer sequel with more focus on the things people enjoyed in the first game like fast gameplay, flow focused levels and cute costumes (two this time).

name: Townseek: Jam Version
summary: Townseek: Jam Version is a relaxing exploration-trading game where you fly around the world. Travel far and wide, discover exotic landmarks, trade with towns, fish, mine, farm, and complete your journal's collection!

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Portable Honey Milk Disc
summary: A port for PSP.

name: Tokyo Ghoul: Break the Chains
summary:
The timing of the special move and the combination of characters are the key to victory or defeat! Strategic factors such as the order of skill execution and the timing of activation of special moves can also change the situation of the battle!

It features a plot “tangled between humans and ghouls”, a dungeon system that can be enjoyed by a single player, a co-battle system that allows you to fight side by side with other players , real-time PVP battles, etc. It's full of playable content!

name: Touhou Battle Raiders
summary:
Suddenly, numerous monsters appear and Gensokyo is once again in danger of destruction.
Touhou Battle Raiders is a strategy RPG developed by four doujin circles; Hachimitsu Kumasan, AQUA STYLE, Strawberry Bose and Kanagawa Denshi Gijutsu Kenkyuujo. Through the campaign, the player retains control of four characters, across a battlefield against hordes of enemy forces in real-time with boss battles at the end of each round. In the campaign the player must complete the main objective to proceed to the next chapter, but there are also optional routes which can be completed alongside the main quests with rare items as reward. In between battles, players can access their characters to equip them with purchased goods or items gained from previous adventures.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Portable Dark Cherry Disc
summary:
A port of PSP.
Dark cherry disc focus on the three main guys for entry no.7-9: Rudo Jesus (Entry no.7), Moroboshi Tetsu (Entry no.8), and Hamada Shinnosuke (Entry no.9)

name: Towers of Mergethorne
summary: Every night the creeps attack, blending Bubble Shooter, Merge, and Tower Defense gameplay. Merge stronger and stronger towers until you eventually merge a powerful Warden. Awaken all five to win and save Mergethorne! Unless the creeps decimate it first...

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Shinra-Bansho Music Pack
summary:
Phase 1 pack includes the twin vocals of Ayaponzu* & Ayo,and popular artist Shinra-Bansho!
This pack includes 6 songs, each with their own challenges.

name: Touhou Sky Arena
summary:
Touhou Sky Arena is a 3D style flying fighter game from makers of Magical Battle Arena.

The game, when patched to the Hayate 1.51 version, can be combined with the sequel,
Kurenai 1.51 version, using the Matsuri patch.
The Matsuri path gives access to all characters, stages and music available in both games.

name: Tower Hover
summary: Tower Hover is an endless building game where players stack sections of a skyscraper to create the tallest structure possible. The goal is to align each new section perfectly on top of the previous one. If the placement isn't accurate, the misaligned part gets cut off, making subsequent placements more challenging. The game ends when a section completely misses the tower. How high can you build before it all comes crashing down?

name: Tocovix
summary: Place Crosses on the game board and complete Shapes. Earn Stops to block your opponents and make your way to victory! Play with your friends on the same device or challenge other players Online.

name: Toy Zombies
summary: Escape the abandoned mall by hiding from the creatures, learn their behaviors and explore the place to find the way out.

name: Touhou Danmaku Kagura: Phantasia Lost - Extra Song Pack 2
summary:
This is the second DLC for Touhou DanmaExtra Song Pack with 25 songs that include the original "Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon"

This is addtional content that enables the following songs:
- Hitotsuyogari no Touhikou
- Scream out!
- Against, Perfect Cherry Blossom
- SAMURAI GHOST GIRL, KILL! KILL!
- far away
- Shinreibyou Akimatsuri!
- Shoutoku Densetsu ~ True Administrator
- Never Come Undoneku Kagura Phantasia Lost .

name: ToneTrek
summary: A colorful logic puzzle game where each step changes tile colors in a looping sequence. Plan your moves, recreate target patterns, and solve handcrafted levels across multiple game modes with minimalist style and relaxing flow.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 is a remake of the original Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3, bundled in the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 collection.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Predator
summary: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Predator is a tactical shooter video game developed by Virtuos, published by Ubisoft for the PlayStation Portable, and released in 2010.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Hata no Kokoro
summary:
Introducing "Hata no Kokoro" the expressive pokerface!
Has the "Combo Morph: 3 Types" ability that gives you three types of Special Bubbles depending on the color of your fifth combo.
When the 5th combo is performed by a red/purple bubble, a "Flam Bubble" appears on the opponent's field.
Yellow/Green will grant you a "Thunderswipe Bubble", and Blue will grant you a Paint Bubble.
Also, the Spell Card is a distinctive character!

name: Too Human
summary: As the cybernetic god Baldur, players are thrust into the midst of an ongoing battle that threatens the existence of mankind. An ancient machine presence has forced the hand of the gods, and now Baldur is charged with defending humanity from an onslaught of monstrous war machines bent on the eradication of human life.

name: Tochi
summary: Tochi is a simple Action-Adventure game set in a dungeon filled with enemies that will attack you without a second thought! And if you die it's game over! Made exclusively for the Playdate!

name: Touhou Kosuzu no Butsuri Game!
summary: This is a very stupid Touhou 2nd creation physics game featuring Kosuzu-chan, who is stuck in a jar!

name: Toy Shire
summary: Are you prepared for a thrilling toy army tower defense adventure? Welcome The Toy Shire! Battle diverse foes in various locations, defend your family, and repel foes from your area. Save the world by strengthening your defense with toy towers!

name: Top Gunner
summary: Overhead run'n gun-style shoot-'em-up. You play as jeep driver and gunner rescuing POWs. More commonly known as Jackal outside the US.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow
summary: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow is a stealth video game developed and published by Ubisoft Shanghai and Ubisoft Milan, while Ubisoft Montreal, developer of the original Splinter Cell, was working on Chaos Theory. Pandora Tomorrow is the second game in the Splinter Cell series endorsed by writer Tom Clancy. The game follows the covert activities of Sam Fisher, an agent working for a black-ops branch of the National Security Agency (NSA) called "Third Echelon". Sam Fisher is voiced by Michael Ironside. Dennis Haysbert voices the character Irving Lambert, Fisher's boss, making this the only time he is not voiced by Don Jordan. Lalo Schifrin provides the theme music for the game. A remastered high-definition version of Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow was announced for the PlayStation Network for the PlayStation 3 on December 20, 2010.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - Tao Qian
summary: Tao Qian has long been a steward of the Han and his own territory. He is renowned as a dependable and respectable governor, and one who focuses on building tall. He wants to make life better for the people he governs, and defends his lands against those would dare to encroach upon it.

name: Touchgrind BMX 3: Rivals
summary: Touchgrind BMX 3: Rivals is the next evolution of extreme sports on mobile. Compete in high-intensity multiplayer battles, master a deep trick system, and explore stunning real-world-inspired locations. With new game modes, enhanced progression, and smoother gameplay, the ultimate BMX experience is now better than ever.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4 is a remake of the two skateboarding games originally released in the early 2000s. Players perform tricks, complete objectives, and explore varied skate parks across global locations. The gameplay emphasizes fluid controls, combo chaining, and arcade-style challenges. Each title features a roster of professional skaters, along with customizable characters and gear. The collection preserves the core mechanics of the originals while offering updated visuals and performance on modern platforms.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4: Digital Deluxe Edition
Top Trumps: Doctor Who
summary: Eidos creates a virtual version of the card game populated by the weird denizens of Dr. Who.

name: Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction: React Strike Pack
summary:
Enhance your Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction experience with the REACT Strike Pack, including:

Frontline Cosmetic Pack (includes Spectrum headgear, uniform and weapon skin, plus the REACT Lockjaw charm)
REACT Strike Pack, XP Boosters for postlaunch events
10% discount on the in-game store
This content is also available by purchasing Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Extraction Deluxe Edition.

name: Tobit
summary: A relaxing walking simulator game with biblical narration from the book of Tobit. Relive a narrated biblical story of Tobit in an engaging forest environment.

name: Total War: Warhammer - Jade Wizard
summary:
Jade Wizard is a Empire missile infantry unit. Acolytes of the green Wind of Magic use the natural world and its seasons to heal and protect their companions.

Practitioners of The Jade Order study Ghyran, the Lore of Life. Powerful healers, they travel the Empire offering their services to civilians and armies alike.

name: Touryuu Densetsu: Elan Doree
summary: Touryuu Densetsu: Elan Doreé is a fantasy-themed 3D fighting game; it is notable for its dragon-based, aerial combat mechanics. It was originally released in arcades on Sega’s ST-V hardware in November 1998 and later ported to the Sega Saturn in 1999.

name: Tower Offence!
summary:
"Attacks aggressively by build a lot of towers"It's a consept of this game.
You can stack friend units any number of people,without limitation.
"Strength in numbers" is the key to victory!

name: Touring Karts
summary: Touring Karts takes maximum advantage of the possibilities of VR by reinventing KART-type races in the midst of chaos full of action and surprises.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 offers a fresh take on combo-driven skateboarding, the most advanced Pro Skater online multiplayer experience in a Tony Hawk game, and a state-of-the-art skatepark builder.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
summary: Unlike the previous mobile games, Tomb Raider: Legend was designed in 3D for high-end devices. The game is a side-scrolling platformer with polygonal 3D graphics. Most of the gameplay involves running left and right, jumping between platforms and shooting the various enemies that stand in Lara's way. Obstacles such as electric cables and laser defense systems have to be avoided either by jumping over or rolling under. Sometimes Lara has to swing around poles or use her grappling hook to reach far off platforms. The grappling hook can also be used to swing into and knock out enemies. The gunfights are quite simple and only Lara's regular handgun can be used. Bullets can be dodged by crouching but the enemies can do the same.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
summary: The Nintendo DS version of Tomb Raider: Legend differs significantly from its console counterparts. While it retains the original plot and cutscenes, the platforming and environmental puzzles have been adapted into a side-scrolling format with some 3D elements. The game also includes occasional motorcycle segments. Typically, the upper screen displays the main action, while the lower screen manages inventory, which is controlled using the stylus. During combat, the lower screen shifts to a first-person view, requiring players to tap enemies to defeat them. As in other versions, gameplay centers on retrieving artifacts in exotic locations; on the DS, players must blow into the microphone to dust them off. Although Lara moves primarily in two dimensions, the graphics are rendered in 3D, and the environments are often presented from varied angles, diverging from the traditional side-on perspective common in the genre.

name: Total War: Rome II - Campaign Pack: Wrath of Sparta
summary: Wrath of Sparta introduces an entirely new, epic campaign expansion for Total War: Rome II focusing exclusively on the Hellenic world, plunging players into the turbulent events of the iconic Peloponnesian Wars.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Collaborations Pack
summary:
This “Touhou Collaborations Pack” contains collaborations between popular Touhou acts!
Enjoy the musical mixes that they've created!

name: Toast Astronauts
summary: Complete all tasks or exile the assasin!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: The Phoenix Shield Edition
summary:
The Phoenix Shield Collector's Edition of Tom Clancy's The Division 2 game includes special physical content: 
 
Tom Clancy's The Division 2 game. 
The Phoenix Shield limited edition box. 
The Mark Johnson articulated figurine by UbiCollectibles. 
An exclusive steelbook. 
The Art of The Division 2 book of lithographs. 
A selected game soundtrack. 
World map. 
 
Also get additional digital content: 
 
A 3-days early access to the game. 
The Battleworn Secret Service Pack including the Secret service outfit, a rare quality emote, and exotic quality M4A1 Skin. 
The Capitol Defender Pack, including Exotic SPAS-12 Shotgun, the weapon blueprint, and the Hazmat 2.0 outfit. 
The First Responder Pack, including a special outfit and weapon skin. 
The Elite Agent Pack, including an exotic Assault Rifle, an exclusive skill effect, and additional stash space.

name: Tomboy: Trapped by Orcs
summary: You have been captured by orc women for a mysterious ritual. To escape, you must navigate their camp, learn the orc culture… and discover their unexpected intentions.

name: Tokyo Majin Gakuen Gehouchou: Keppuuroku
summary: A remake of Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Gehouchou. As with the tradition of Tokyo Majin games, this is an adventure/strategy RPG hybrid.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Advanced Warfighter
summary:
The year is 2013 and you play as Captain Mitchell, commander of a Ghost Recon team, on a mission in Mexico City where rebels are attempting a coup, putting Mexico and the USA in danger.

To deal with the different situations you have to face, taking out AA-guns or defending injured personnel until the rescue team arrives, you do not only have access to top-notch weapons like the different versions of the MR-C, but also to futuristic equipment like a drone that flies over the battlefield to spot enemy units.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Special Music Pack Vol. 2
summary:
This is Vol. 2! Get new arrangements of 6 popular Toho songs
accompanied by 6 challenge stages.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Breakpoint - Year 1 Pass
summary:
The Year 1 Pass includes:
- Mission: Siren's Call, previously called Greenstone
- Expansion: Deep State
- Expansion: Red Patriot, previously called Transcendence
- In-game DLC: Special Operations Forces Pack

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Limited Edition
summary:
In the wake of the virus, storms, flooding, and subsequent chaos have radically transformed Washington, D.C. Explore a living open world full of diverse environments, from flooded urban areas to historic sites and landmarks, during one of the hottest summers in history
Play alone or with up to 3 friends in a 40-hour campaign in a torn and boiling Washington D.C. and prolong your The Division 2 journey with fresh, unique, and diverse challenges
Explore a large and dynamic living world, which evolves depending on your actions and help liberating the city with tactical interventions.
Discover a revamped PvP gameplay in a brand new Dark Zone designed to provide a fair and exciting experience to all players, regardless of their level of progression.
Take part in the never-seen before endgame content and one year of free DLC: new missions, areas and games features.

name: Tower of Winter
summary: For decades, the harsh winter persists, forcing people to rely on a blend of magic and steam technology to survive. However, their plight is becoming increasingly desperate. The source of the endless winter is rumored to reside within a tower at the northernmost point of the continent.

name: Touhou Saikotan: Servants of Harvest Wish
summary:
A Touhou fangame created by the group Dream Compass.
The game features a "Harvest Mode" system where grazing rewards you with harvest items. These harvest items will put you into Harvest Mode after filling up your Harvest Gauge. In Harvest Mode, all point items and faith items on screen will be auto-collected. You will gain point item value for all harvest items obtained during Harvest Mode, as well as up to three spell pieces for collecting a sufficient amount of harvest items.

name: Toilet Paper Simulator
summary: Try to survive in the role of toilet paper and try to escape from the house of a crazy old man with diarrhea.

name: Tormented Souls II
summary: Caroline Walker returns in the sequel to the award-winning survival horror classic. Explore the decaying remains of the secluded Villa Hess, use improvised weapons to confront terrifying creatures, and bend the fabric of reality to save your sister from a twisted cult.

name: Top Down Battlegrounds
summary:
Top Down Battlegrounds is a single player 2D top down shooter game which aims on providing a fun top down shooter experience. It allows you to customize your experience with various options, and play the game your way.

Embark on multiple campaigns, where you can personalize the colors of your team and the enemy team as well as your loadout for each mission. Campaign level selection is done through an interactive map, offering both open and non-linear progression. Conquer adjacent territories and choose which levels to attack first.

The gameplay is simple and reminiscent of a top-down version of a first-person shooter. The base game features a limited number of campaigns and weapons, but more interesting content is planned for future DLCs.

name: To Your Stations!
summary: To Your Stations! is a couch co-op spaceship management game where you work with your friends to crew a spaceship to fight off asteroids, aliens, and other deep space entities. Choose from several ships, each with their own unique mechanics, and a selection of vibrant characters.

name: Toro's Friend Network
summary:
Dungeon crawler with Toro and friends. Includes a "Friend Network" social app.

It was the first game in the Doko Demo Issyo series to see release outside of Asia.

name: Touhou Seirensen: Undefined Fantastic Object
summary: The 12th game in the Touhou Project.

name: Toriki: The Castaway Island
summary: A companion app necessary for playing the Toriki: The Castaway Island board game from Lucky Duck Games. Toriki: The Castaway Island is a cooperative family game of adventure, exploration and survival mixing an app with physical components.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Fresh Ginger Disc
summary: Fandisc of the Yamanote Boys series featuring Misaki Kotarou (Honey Milk), Kirishima Iori (Super Mint), and Moroboshi Tetsu (Dark Cherry).

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Critical Hour
summary: In Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Critical Hour, Ubisoft's Quebec studio blends the finest elements of Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six series to create the most complete chapter to date. This latest chapter marks the return to the franchise's roots by reintroducing the deeply strategic and tactical gameplay synonymous with the Rainbow Six name, while incorporating classic in-game elements such as vintage maps and weapons, all rebuilt using today's technology. Rainbow Six Critical Hour brings a new seven-mission single-player campaign and 18 multiplayer levels.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
summary: Tomb Raider: Legend is the seventh major game in the Tomb Raider series, now for the first time developed by Crystal Dynamics, along with the original character designer of the game's protagonist, Lara Croft. It serves as a reboot of the franchise, with a new incarnation of Lara Croft. The typical third-person action-adventure exploring is still present, and Lara can move more freely because specific jumps no longer limit her. As players travel through rough environments, they will need to run, dive, swim, climb on poles, ladders, and roofs, use zip lines, shimmy, and vault, with acrobatic actions such as somersaults and flips. Players need to cross difficult terrain, solve puzzles to advance or open up new areas, and engage in combat.

name: Toon Blast
summary: Enter the crazy cartoon world starring Cooper Cat, Wally Wolf, Bruno Bear and enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels! Blast cubes and create powerful combos to pass levels. Solve puzzles to help the Toon gang as they travel around magical worlds!

name: Tomb Raider: Chronicles
summary: Tomb Raider: Chronicles is the fifth game in the Tomb Raider series and the sequel to Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation. It was developed by Core Design and published by Eidos Interactive. Like its predecessors, Tomb Raider: Chronicles is an action game with puzzle-solving and platforming elements. The gameplay is very similar to that of the previous games, with the addition of a few new skills. Lara can now walk on tightropes, swing on horizontal bars, and somersault forwards from a ledge while crouching. A grappling hook has been added to her inventory. The game also includes a level editor, allowing the player to create new stages for Lara to explore.

name: Touhou Tougenkyuu: Riverbed Soul Saver
summary: Fan-made Touhou Project game programmed by ido (known for previous fangames The Last Comer and Mystical Power Plant) and Len (known for the fangame Phantasmagoria Trues). The main gameplay mechanic involves a gauge that the player fills up by collecting items. Once full, holding down the bomb key will 'unlock' the player's full strength with a powered-up mode for a short period of time.

name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
summary: The Wii port of Tomb Raider: Anniversary carries over the levels and general gameplay of the other versions while incorporating motion controls. Wii-exclusive first-person puzzles include breaking through walls with a pickaxe, using a flashlight in dark areas, assembling mechanisms from pieces found around the environment, manipulating symbol-based locks and using paper and charcoal to take rubbings of puzzle-related symbols, all utilizing the Wii Remote.

name: Tomb Raider: The Kurtis Trent Chronicles - Chapter 1
summary:
It is the late 1990s. Former legionnaire Kurtis Trent now operates as a freelance mercenary. His specialism: the supernatural.

Following a series of mysterious deaths after the discovery of a medieval shrine deep beneath a Welsh mine, Kurtis has been hired to find whatever otherworldly force is wreaking havoc, and take care of it. Little does he know that what he is about to stumble upon will lead him down a dangerous path, one of ancient cults and arcane knowledge, that will bring him face-to-face with demons from his own past, and ultimately, into a battle for the very survival of mankind...

name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation - The Times
summary: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation - The Times is a downloadable bonus level from Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation. It is available only on the PC, and unlike previous expansions, does not require the disc for Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation. This bonus level was a promotion for The Times newspaper celebrating the discovery of the Tutankhamun's tomb 75th anniversary.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend Demake - Chapter One
summary:
Tomb Raider: Legend Demake is a fan-made reimagining of Tomb Raider: Legend using the classic Tomb Raider engine. Originally released in 2006 and developed by Crystal Dynamics, Tomb Raider: Legend has been adapted here by Delca using an enhanced version of the Tomb Raider IV engine (TRNG). The gameplay and environments have been reinterpreted to reflect the style and design typical of Core Design's work in the late 1990s, often referred to as the "classic" era.

Chapter One features four levels: Croft Manor, Bolivia, Peru, and Japan. A follow-up containing the second half of the game is currently in development.

The story centers on Lara’s search for her mother and the mythical sword Excalibur, with some narrative elements reworked and simplified for this version.

Cutscenes are voiced in French, with English subtitles provided.

name: Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
summary: Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness is the sixth game in the Tomb Raider series, and is the sequel to Tomb Raider: Chronicles. Angel of Darkness introduces new stealth and close-combat moves - ducking, sneaking and hug-the-walls walking. Lara must build her skills by performing action sequences. You'll have her running, dodging, performing flying leaps and platform jumps, shimming along walls and cables, as well as moving boxes and other obstacles around. Advancements are achieved with strategically placed power-ups. Collect weapons and ammunition, artifacts and money.

name: Tomb Raider II
summary: Tomb Raider II is the second game of the Tomb Raider games series. It is an action game with platforming and puzzle-solving elements, similar in concept and gameplay to its predecessor. Most of the gameplay consists of traversing hazardous 3D levels utilizing Lara's athletic skills and solving environmental puzzles. The sequel puts more emphasis on fighting enemies, adding many human foes to the mix. Additional weapons include a harpoon gun, a grenade launcher, and an M16 rifle. Automatic pistols replace the magnums from the first game.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend
summary: This version of Tomb Raider: Legend includes a few omissions, likely due to disc space limitations. The rolling demos that typically play when the game is left idle on the title screen have been removed, and the "Unfortunate Mishaps" video is also absent. Additionally, several visual filters used for explosions and motion blur have been removed, resulting in sharper textures but less visually striking explosions.

name: Tomb Raider: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Tomb Raider is a critically acclaimed action adventure that explores the intense and gritty origin story of Lara Croft and her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor. Armed only with raw instincts and the ability to push beyond the limits of human endurance, Lara must fight to unravel the dark history of a forgotten island to escape its relentless hold. The Game of the Year edition includes the Tomb of the Lost Adventurer, 6 single player outfits for Lara, 8 multiplayer maps, and 4 characters.

name: Toxoplasma
summary: You are trapped on an abandoned space station, developing a bio-weapon that makes the infected hallucinate demonic entities. Spot any anomalous signs of infection before they kill you, complete your research, and unmask the conspiracy that brought you here.

name: Tomb Raider: Underworld
summary:
Tomb Raider: Underworld represents a new advancement in exploration-based gameplay. As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explore exotic locations around the world, each designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of challenge and choice.

Reach new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and utilize objects within the environment to uncover new paths to explore. Discover ancient mysteries of the underworld hidden within the coast of Thailand, frozen islands of the Arctic Sea, the jungles of Mexico, and more.

Each level is an elaborate multi-stage puzzle masked within an interactive environmental playground offering more flexibility over how the area is solved. Choose to pacify or kill, target multiple enemies at once with the new dual-target system, and shoot with one hand while suspended with the other.

name: Touhou Pocket Wars Evolution Plus
summary: Touhou Pocket Wars Evolution Plus is an expansion that was released at Fancy Frontier16 in July, 2010. It adds a follow-up story and new characters, as well as characters of Undefined Fantastic Object in battle.

name: To The Grave: The Hunters of Faenora
summary: Tactics reborn in glorious pixel art. To The Grave: The Hunters of Faenora is a roguelite tactics RPG inspired by the golden age of strategy games. Command a customizable squad of pixel-perfect Hunters, master grid-based battles and face brutal permadeath with every step. Optional Web3 integration unlocks a high-stakes, player-driven economy, where your rarest units might not live to see another run.

name: Torchance 6
summary: In Torchance 6, up to 4 players can take on the task of managing all aspects of a football club.Unlike other football management games, you can easily complete a season in less than 60 minutes if you wish. This makes this game ideal for a quick round or two when you only have a few spare minutes.

name: Toru
summary: Toru is a bullet-hell platformer where absolutely everything that falls into your hands becomes a weapon! Boxes, crystals, bombs and even the enemies themselves! Your success depends only on your skill!

name: Toki no Kizuna Hanayuitsuzuri
summary: A fandisc for the original Toki no Kizuna, featuring original omake stories for all of the boys set after the end of the original game.

name: Tower!3D: ZBAD Airport
summary: Beijing Daxing International Airport (IATA: PKX, ICAO: ZBAD), ZBAD is Beijing's second international airport that has been nicknamed "the starfish" because of its look.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands - Ultimate Edition
summary:
Get the complete Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands experience with the Ultimate Edition. Take down the Santa Blanca Cartel however you choose in this open world military shooter, with 4-player co-op. Includes the main game, Season Pass, Year 2 Pass, and Ghost War Pass.

Season Pass includes: Narco Road DLC, Fallen Ghosts DLC, two exclusive missions, the Ghost War Pass, and more.

Year 2 Pass includes: Early access to 6 new Ghost War Classes, the Splinter Cell pack, 4 Spec Op crates, and 4 Ghost War crates.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands - Narco Road
summary: Narco Road, the off-road-racin', parachute-jumpin', let's-have-a-party expansion will be out for season pass at first, and after that for everyone else. The expansion will include more than 15 new campaign missions, plus four new types of side missions and "racing challenges" that will earn "fame and followers" for hard-driving superstars.

name: To Kill a God
summary: An immersive action roguelite experience with a groundbreaking skill system that allows you to craft your own skill tree. unlock the true potential of your character, delivering an ever-evolving experience.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X: Elite Edition
summary:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege X is the undisputed reference in tactical team shooters, where elite strategy and execution triumph.

Siege X marks the biggest evolution in its history and deepens the game’s tactical core.

The Elite Edition grants access to all game modes including Ranked playlists and the Siege Cup, and 16 additional operators.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier
summary:
The story of a Vengeance, the history of a secret war.

When a stolen military grade bomb takes out a Ghost squad, a new Ghost Unit must track down the source of the weapons. But the trail Kozak, Ghost Lead, Pepper and 30K follow leads around the world, into the corridors of power where rebellion and war are brewing. Soon, the Ghosts are all that stands between the world and a devastating global conflict.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - Reign of Blood
summary: This pack introduces a number of new gory and mature-rated effects, animations and kill-moves to the game in both Campaign and Battle.

name: Tower of the Ice Lich
summary: A pixelated homage to 16-bit RPGs, this former print-and-play card game has come full circle as a digital experience! Choose your champion, enter the tower, and make wise decisions on your ascent to face the Ice Lich at the top

name: Touhou Rock Maiden: Houraisan Kaguya no Yabou!?
summary: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: Tommygun's Frag
summary: Born from the hit Rust mod, Tommygun's Frag is a standalone FPS about momentum and domination. Start with a pistol, frag enemies, and race to unlock better weapons. A first-of-its-kind recoil visualization system shows your recoil as you fire, letting you outskill opponents.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Blacklist - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Blacklist Deluxe Edition comes with all the essential weapons, gadgets, and gear for you to become Sam Fisher and stop the escalating Blacklist threats. With two bonus missions and five bonus suits, armor upgrades, and weapons, you'll be prepared to stop the attacks!

Content Includes:
- The High Power DLC Pack:
- AC S12 Shotgun
- GC36C Assault Rifle
- MP5-10 SMG
- PP-19 Black Market SMG
- USP45 Hand Gun

name: Todd's Adventures in Slime World
summary: You are Todd, the explorer of new worlds. It's your adventure to travel deep into Slime World, the gooiest, drippiest place around. There are scary blobs to shoot and lots of objects and weapons to find. "Link up" with up to seven of your fellow slimers for an awesome multiplayer adventure.

name: Today I Die
summary: An short, experimental art game by Daniel Benmergui, in which the player manipulates text, characters and objects to change the environment and escape.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Khyber Strike
summary: The third downloadable content pack for Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier, Khyber Strike features three new multiplayer maps, a new multiplayer game mode called Takeover, a new Guerrilla Mode co-op map, new achievements, and an increased level cap.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1
summary: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 is a remake of the original Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, bundled in the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1+2 collection.

name: Told God: The Legacy of Cthulhu
summary: This is a Cthulhu theme survival adventure game. You can play Vincent, the descendant of the survivors in "The call of Cthulhu", and a mysterious woman of unknown identity, in a island in the South Pacific Ocean, experiencing the thrilling adventure that makes human beings become "originer".

name: Today, I'm Harvesting You
summary: Very poor and very tired of being single, you set out for your day with one goal: change both of those things, no matter the cost!!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: YSSY Airport
summary: [YSSY] - Sydney Airport by FlyTampa, developed by FeelThere for Tower - realistic modeling with over 100 custom modelled buildings including Terminal interiors, New Gate 10, Kilo Ramp and Shopping Terminal and much more! Take control over Sydney airport and sky!

name: To Aru Otoko to Onna no Naresome
summary: Curses, love and hate. A story of a man and a woman set in a dark, Asian-style setting.

name: Toy Soldiers: Cold War
summary:
The Cold War ignites when '80s era action toys come alive and wage war!
Toy Soldiers: Cold War delivers hours of intense combat combined with addictive action strategy gameplay. Superpowers collide in this playful homage to '80s action toys and films. Command the powerful Cold War arsenals of the USA or USSR armies!

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu - Arrangements Pack
summary: This new Music pack, "Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack" contains new arrangements of six popular Touhou Youyoumu songs and six challenge stages go to with each song.

name: Tom Clancy's ruthless.com
summary:
This isn't business. This is war.

How far will you go?

The simultaneous turn-based strategy game that lets you build a corporation atop the bodies of your competition. Use thugs, hackers or the occasional lawyer to get what you want, the way you want. You don't need ethics, just greed, ego and a few wicked instincts.

Ever thrown a lawyer off a pier? Hacked into a mainframe to swipe classified information? If not, then it's time you went into business with Tom Clancy's ruthless.com.

Find out if you have what it takes not only to survive but to dominate in an industry of cutthroats and corporate raiders. You can forget about ethics- succeeding here means putting all your strategy skills into beefing up your bottom line. But don't worry. You'll have help. A vicious gallery of hackers, thugs and lawyers are waiting to carry out your every greedy whim. And if they fail you, fire them. Or fire at them.

Just don't expect this to be some sissy business sim. You and up to five other competitors do whatever it takes to build a software empire. In the end, the only thing anyone will remember is who comes out on top.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack Kogasa Tatara
summary:
Introducing “Kogasa Tatara” the cheery forgotten umbrella!
She is an additional character with the ability to cover up the opponent’s area with her Karakasa Bubble.

name: Totems: Game of Conquest
summary: The game design is derived from the world-famous “4-Color Map Theorem”. The randomness of the totems in your ‘hand’, the changing colors of the territories, the variety of the maps, and the cleverness of your opponents will all conspire to make each turn a fun and interesting challenge.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC1 Pack: Forest of Magic & Youkai Mountain
summary: This DLC is Touhou Mystia’s Izakaya’s expansion DLC.

name: Torikago no Marriage: Hatsukoi no Tsubasa
summary: Torikago no Marriage: Hatsukoi no Tsubasa is an otome game, developed by Kalmia8 and published by dramatic create, which was released in Japan in 2016.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya
summary:
This is a brand new izakaya simulation gameplay.
The young night sparrow and her BBQ has become a welcome sight in Gensokyo with her hard work and flourishing business-that is, until one day, that fateful enemy showed up whom broke her dream. Start from scratch, loaded with debt, it's all or nothing on today's cooking.

name: Tomeling in Trouble
summary: Battle head-to-head with a friend or family member in the MOBA-inspired Sanctum mode. In this mode, the heroes on both teams need to defend their own portal while destroying the portal of the other team, with the help of minions on each team. A single-player practice mode is also available to master the different spells each hero has to offer. Multiple hero options make this competitive fun for all ages! The arcade-style Classic mode is also available, for any of those less competitive moments. There are multiple levels in which you help Tomeling survive, with varying difficulties that award more gold for their toughness.

name: To the Kingdom
summary: Build your kingdom in this strategic multiplayer board game. Plan your cities and villages carefully, manage resources and cards wisely, and outsmart your rivals. Master the game's rules and sharpen your tactics as you march To the Kingdom. Only the most cunning will claim victory!

name: Tower Dash
summary:
Play Tower Dash! The super addictive new game from the creators of Bird Climb and Spider Square. In this simple one touch Multiplayer game your goal is to shoot threads left and right to climb up the tower without hitting any of the obstacles.

Sounds Easy? Believe us it is not! You'll be swinging in no time, but it takes super human reflexes to master it! Collect diamonds on your way and unlock insanely cool new heroes!

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike
summary: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike is the expansion to Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2. There are several minor differences between Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: Summit Strike, and Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2. The most notable being the difficulty, Summit Strike being regarded as the harder of the two. Other differences would include new multiplayer modes, such as Heli Hunt.

name: Touhou Mystery Reel
summary: Touhou Mystery Reel is a horizontal scrolling action game. The game has a unique combat system. Players make different decisions in the level, which will trigger different plots at the end of the level. It is up to the player to challenge a stronger BOSS or do something "dirty".

name: Toodee and Topdee
summary:
The original version of the PC and console game, made under 72 hours as a submission to Ludum Dare 41.

What happens when a platform game and a top down game are combined?

name: Touhou Rhythm Carnival! Kurenai
summary: Touhou Rhythm Carnival Kurenai is a Rhythm Heaven like game including Touhou characters. It is made by Focus Lens and it mainly focuses on Embodiment of Scarlet Devil characters. This game is also known as Touhou Rhythm Carnival Kurenai

name: Touhou DollDraft
summary: Touhou DollDraft is a game in which you form teams comprising "dollified" Touhou Project characters and send them into battle against each other.

name: Touhou Gensou Rambu: Yuujou, Uragiri, Shouri
summary: A doujin game by CAPRICORN based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Totally Spies! Cyber Mission
summary:
Totally Spies! Cyber Mission is a brand-new story set in the world of the new Season 7 of the Totally Spies! series.

Playing as Sam, Clover and Alex, players will be plunged into the heart of Singapore, where every street and every corner holds secrets to be discovered. Whether playing solo or in local multiplayer mode for up to three players, they will have the opportunity to master the art of infiltration, solve complex puzzles and, thanks to a variety of fashionable gadgets, save the world with style!

name: Touhou Arcadia Record
summary: Touhou Arcadia Record is a game application for smartphones released by Damo Games on July 28, 2022. It is an authorized derivative work of Touhou Project.

name: Top Gun: Firestorm
summary:
Top Gun: Firestorm was developed by Fluid Studios and published by Titus Interactive in 2001 for Game Boy Color, and the following year for Game Boy Advance. It is an Isometric flight action game with missions to complete.

Top Gun: Firestorm takes the player to the skies again in twelve missions where numerous aerial and ground based enemies need to be fought to arhieve victory.

The player will fly a F-14 Tomcat on an isometric map. He has to complete several objectives in each mission. To achieve those he has four different weapons at his disposal (machine gun, bombs, rockets and missiles). The gameplay is somewhat similar to the Strike series.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Rhythm Game Song Pack
summary: Containing hits like "Usatei" by Cool&Create and "Machibito Ha Kozu." by Butaotome, the "Rhythm Game Song Pack" has you covered with all your favorites from rhythm games.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: NZAA Airport
summary: Auckland Airport (IATA: AKL, ICAO: NZAA) is a major international airline hub serving New Zealand with many domestic and international destinations. The largest and busiest single-runway airport in Oceania.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 (Holiday Special)
summary: Return to the world of To the Moon in this heartfelt spin-off that dives deeper into the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. During a holiday season filled with both festive cheer and public protests against the Sigmund Corporation, this minisode explores the ethical dilemmas and emotional challenges behind their wish-fulfillment work.

name: Tobira no Densetsu: Kaze no Tsubasa
summary: Lucia Maverick has worked as a maid in the remote village of Kast, home to many fleeing their pasts, for the last five years after the death of her parents. But her sick little sister, Anna, grows weaker by the day, and so Lucia plans to set out on a journey to Lestaria in hopes of finding employment as a Royal Guard on her fifteenth birthday, thereby securing funds for Anna's treatment. But things do not go as planned, and the return of a past terror is just the beginning of a small yet massive adventure...

name: Tomb Raider Reloaded
summary: Tomb Raider Reloaded is a free-to-play arcade shooter developed by Emerald City Games and published by CDE Entertainment. It's based on the original CORE Design Tomb Raider games from the late 1990s, recreated in a new colorful art style and presented with a top-down perspective.

name: Too Many Cooks
summary: Too Many Cooks is 1-6 local co-op game for mobile where your party runs a kitchen, chaotically juggling cooking, time and sending ingredients between their team! Players will need to talk, shout and discuss to organise both their pipeline and team!

name: Tomb Raider: The Tower Bridge Experience
summary:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the TombEngine while creating its own story and puzzles.

This level started as a training ground and experimental ground for the author to get back into level building, and push the new TombEngine to its limits. As part of Matrix54's Revival Challenge he decided to pay homage to the late Dhama's Tower Bridge levels created in 2001. As a test he attempted to create Tower Bridge in Tomb Raider with its proper dimensions, a feat wouldn't be possible before TEN (TombEngine). And it just grew from there!

name: Toaru Majutsu to Kagaku no Ensemble
summary: Toaru Majutsu to Kagaku no Ensemble is a Japanese visual novel based on the Toaru Majutsu no Index universe. The game features four storylines from the Toaru Majutsu no Index main series, and the Toaru Kagaku no Railgun sidestories converging. Missions or quests can be accessed from the map, at the start of a new game, where the player can chose a place with some "event". The map encompasses of all Academy City. In the map, the player can view the character whom the event is about, its name, the place where it will occur, and the other characters the player will be accompanied by. Some events need to be unlocked first. The events that are depicted on the map changes depending on the time on the player's PSP.

name: ToeJam & Earl
summary: ToeJam & Earl is an early 1990s dungeon crawler. The game features two alien rappers, who have crash-landed on Earth and parodies 1980s urban culture. The game's design was heavily influenced by the role-playing video game Rogue, and took from it such features as the random generation of levels and items. Played from a 2D-top-down perspective the game contains both single-player and two-player cooperative modes. The latter displays a single screen when both characters are near each other, but splits it apart when they are not. Playing the game with two players reveals dialogue and jokes between the characters not heard in the single player game.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EDDV Airport
summary: The ninth largest airport in Germany, EDDV is available for Tower Simulator 3, developed by FeelThere and SoFly. Hannover Airport [IATA: HAJ, ICAO: EDDV] is the international airport of Hanover in Germany, with 3 interconnected terminals beautifully modeled.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Grim Sky
summary:
For Operation Grim Sky, Rainbow Six is deploying Clash and Maverick. Experts in mob behavior and high-precision strikes respectively, they'll also assess the new training facilities at the reworked Hereford Base. Out with the old and in with the new.

Year Three Season Three is bringing forth modifications to address weapon sights misalignment, an adjustment with the Operator Idle Pick, and improvements to dynamic resolution scaling on consoles. Hatches are also getting a rework which will improve their destruction. Finally, in addition to gameplay and technical fixes, expect a map buff on Consulate.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Red Crow
summary: In Operation Red Crow, two S.A.T. Operators join Team Rainbow to neutralize the threat residing in our new free map, "Skyscraper". This fourth major content update aims to improve game experience, offers new customization opportunities and lots more. The new map Skyscraper also offers fresh tactical opportunities for group-based assaults.

name: Tofu Run: Remastered
summary: Deliver Tofu

name: Totemori
summary: Totemori is play-for-free arena game enjoyable both in multiplayer and single player modes. Your task is to build the tallest possible towers from the building blocks airdropping onto the playing field, and concurrently break your foes' attempts of doing the same. Toss them off the map, or if things really go south blow up everything and level the playing field. Literally.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands - Deluxe Edition
summary:
This Deluxe Edition is available in both retail and digital form and includes:

- Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands (base game)
- Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands - Deluxe Pack (DLC)
- Map of Bolivia (retail only)
- Official soundtrack disc (retail only)

name: Toddler Tech Laptop
summary: An LCD laptop with over 20 educational games in 5 categories covering pre-school curriculum.

name: Tondemo Nishibuuki 2: Paris Boutard Rally
summary:
A nostalgic and new 8bit style game! A pseudo-3D 2D battle race that aims to complete all 10 stages between Paris and Butard!

Make full use of jumps and turbos to step on enemies, climb over cliffs, and defeat unique bosses to win!

Also, it is compatible with red and blue 3-D glasses, and you can see it in 3D by pressing the select button. You can play by switching to 3D mode. Please bring your own glasses.

What is Pico Pi Collection?
This is a new 8-bit style game series that allows you to enjoy a nostalgic and fresh game with a 4-color dot character, single-note BGM, etc.

This work is presented as a game version of a bad but funny comedy manga from the bubble era.

This game is based on the original author's strong wishes and is made to be enjoyed (and tormented) by the unnecessarily long storyline.

*Please note when playing in 3-D mode: This game is visually stimulating, so if you feel unwell, please avoid playing. Also, please do not play for long periods of time and take sufficient breaks while playing.

Other Pico Pi Collection games are currently being distributed, so be sure to check them out!

name: Toon Toon Racing
summary: Toon Toon Racing is a stylized racing game with pretty cool physics and music. Choose your car and get ready!

name: Tobor
summary: Tobor is a spy simulator game where your mission is to observe an insane world using a surveillance camera. You have 7 days to gather intelligence and investigate the tragic story of Undercroft.

name: Tower of the Dragon
summary: Tower of the Dragon is a story-driven, turn-based combat RPG. Treasures and secrets lie in the mysterious tower which appeared after the death of a young dragon.

name: Touhou Unreal Mahjong
summary: Touhou Unreal Mahjong is a Mahjong fangame created by D.N.A.Softwares in March 2009 that involves the Touhou Project' characters, settings, and music released at Reitaisai 6. It, along with the related Magus in Mystic Geometries, are rare examples of ZUN's contributing to fan-made works.

name: Tower Wizard
summary: Help a wizard construct the mightiest wizard tower in this short incremental game!

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Season 10: Price of Power
summary: Price of Power is the name of Season 10 of The Division 2, and it’s available to play today across all platforms for players who own the Warlords of New York expansion or Ubisoft+ subscribers. It kicks off with a new Manhunt for General Peter Anderson, who has stepped in to take leadership of the True Sons in the wake of Antwon Ridgeway’s fall (you can thank Division Agents for that one). Anderson is working with a Black Tusk team to take down The Division, and players will have to go through them to get to him.

name: Touhou Pocket Wars
summary: Touhou Pocket Wars is fan-made Touhou Project strategic RPG based around Gacha Figurines. The player plays themselves as a Touhou-character themed Gacha collector, entering tournaments and leveling up their figurines and accompanying spell cards to take on stronger and stronger opponents.

name: Toska
summary: TOSKA is a short 2D psychological horror game with visual novel, point-and-click, and choice-based elements to influence your play. Play as Miro Demko, as he experiences the horror of his very own dreams.

name: Towards Future
summary: Waking up in the darkness, unable to see the sunrise, he remembered the little master carefully carried him home. The base has already fallen into ruin and there are no signs of any living people here. Where did the little master go? Is there any hope left under the doomsday?

name: Toy Soldiers: War Chest - Hall of Fame Edition
summary:
The Toy Soldiers: War Chest Hall of Fame Edition is the paramount Toy Soldier experience. This fast-paced genre-bending mix of strategy defense and action game brings to life the iconic action figures from your childhood like He-Man(TM), G.I. Joe, and Cobra and four other toy-inspired armies.

With eight unique armies to protect your toy box with - all with distinct strengths and personalities - there's a faction for every play style. Customize your load-out before battle and earn new items while conquering and exploring over 15 unique maps.

Whose toys are best? Grab up to three other friends and find out! Multiplayer includes up to 2v2, survival mode, and you'll be able to play any of the modes co-operatively, locally on one console or online.

New challenges arrive every seven days with the new Weekly War Mode. Earn new content and items when you complete all five maps for the week.

name: Toadette's Christmas Adventure
summary:
Just in time for Christmas is another short but sweet hack. You take on the role of Toadette who just had her Christmas morning ruined by a monster taking her Brother.

Play through 4 action packed snowy levels in order to save your brother and get back to Christmas break!

name: Touhou Mistystory
summary: A free-to-play, single-player Touhou Project fan-made bullet hell shooter that blends light roguelike elements with modified gameplay mechanics. Defeat your enemies and collect dropped spell cards to enhance your abilities!

name: To the Cosmos
summary:
Experience a turtle's story about fulfilling their dream. Get to know local creatures and the environment around you as you make your way to the cosmos. 
 
-Explore the Lake and its five different locations accompanied by music from matty2003. 
-Talk to other creatures and collect treasures the Lake has to offer. 
-Take your time, there is no need to rush.

name: Tokyo Mirage Sessions #FE Encore
summary: You and the rising stars you call friends will need to call on your own creative power - manifested as iconic Fire Emblem characters - to wage a secret war on rogue spirits that feed on creativity. Each encounter will immerse you in deep, turn-based battles that blend the combat of the Fire Emblem and Shin Megami Tensei series into one brutal harmony. Fuse items to craft weaponry; then play to your strengths and crush your foes. Around every corner you'll find fun nods to multiple fandoms, including Fire Emblem references, dungeons themed to the entertainment industry, and stunning musical performances.

name: Tomorrow's Land
summary: Tomorrow’s Land is a free land Where Adventures Begin. It may not be the best game ever created, but it is surely the most fun. The game is not yet finished and is still in active development.

name: Top Spin 3
summary: Top Spin 3 includes more than 25 of the world's top tennis superstars including Roger Federer, Andy Roddick, Maria Sharapova, James Blake, and many others. With all-new action-packed features including signature player animations and expressions, weather changes, situation-specific behaviors, along with revamped audio with enhanced crowd reaction, Top Spin 3 serves up a realistic and exciting tennis video game experience.

name: Toy Defense 2
summary: Tower defense game for android and ios.

name: Tomo the Wildcat
summary:
Tomo the Wildcat is an Azumanga Daioh fangame inspired by Sonic Generations and other fast-paced platformers. You'll play through a variety of stages inspired on the anime with a few twists!

In this adventure, Tomo gets transported by Chiyo's father? to a dream world where she has to save her friends from an unkown force, you'll go from running on the highschool, to flying over the city, surfing over water on the beach and more!

name: ToHeart2 Portable
summary: ToHeart2 Portable is a port of the 2004 visual novel for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Touhou Mahoujou: Book of Star Mythology
summary:
Touhou Project fangame developed by Maceknight and Raichu that originated as a Touhou styled music album, but was eventually made into a game. Gameplay revolves around collecting star items dropped from enemies, where more can be obtained by attacking enemies at close range. Collecting star items increases the Magnitude gauge, which leads to higher point multipliers. Star items do many other things: they factor in gaining resource pieces, they increase the point item value, and gathering enough in a stage will trigger the stage boss's "Last word" spell card.

This game uses the chapter system of Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom, and is also divided into two modes: "Legendary Hero Mode" with infinite lives, and the regular "Legacy Mode". Legendary Hero Mode is different from Pointdevice Mode in that it ignores what chapter you're on; instead, you simply respawn where you died, either at that exact spot or at the bottom of the screen (depending on the setting in the Option menu).

name: Torment: Tides of Numenera
summary: Torment: Tides of Numenera is a game set in the world of Monte Cook's new tabletop RPG setting, Numenera. Torment continues the thematic legacy of Planescape: Torment, the critically acclaimed role-playing game from 1999 that's considered by many to be a hallmark for storytelling in computer RPGs. With Torment, we're creating a rich role-playing experience that explores similar deep, personal themes.

name: Towst: The One Who Sees Things
summary: A first person, story-driven puzzle adventure inspired by the bests. You find yourself in an unknown world, where history and mythology are mixed and warped together.

name: ToHeart2
summary: Following her graduation from middle school, Konomi Yuzuhara enters the same high school as Takāki Kono, her childhood friend. As the new school year begins, they meet their childhood friend Tamaki Kosaka, as well as many new accquaintances. Unbeknownst to the group, their encounters with each other will soon lead to many memorable adventures.

name: Tonic Tile
summary: A Arkanoid/Breakout clone programmed by the French group d3m and published by The Edge for the Atari ST.

name: To Clean The Mountain
summary:
To Clean The Mountain is a platforming adventure where you throw yourself towards the summit. The spirit of the mountain will talk with you as you traverse a variety of environments.

Environments
Handcrafted levels based on a variety of mountainous landscapes. Each environment features unique mechanics for you to interact with and learn, combining the interesting platforming elements with puzzle solving.

The Mountain
Elements of the world change based on how you assist the mountain. The game is completable regardless of your choices, but the difficulty is up to you.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Raven Strike
summary: The second downloadable content for Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Future Soldier, Raven Strike is a throwback to traditional Ghost Recon gameplay. It features larger maps, complex missions and an increased level of difficulty. There are three campaign missions, and a new Guerrilla mode map, each playable with up to four players.

name: Touhou Rekkaden: Rift in a Friendship Game
summary: A doujin game by LION HEART based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Toobin'
summary: Toobin' involves Biff and Jet racing their way down the rapids of a river, riding on tires. You rotate your tyre left or right, and drift as the current sends you, making sure to avoid the banks of the river, and the dividing lines in the middle. Hazards include crocodiles, stray logs and branches, and fishermen - you are armed with a limited supply of tin cans to take care of these. There are gates to slide through on the way down - these give you a points bonus. Each level has a strict time limit to adhere to, although there's a kickin' party at the end if you succeed.

name: Touhou Soujinengi V & Touhou Genso Maroku W Double Pack
summary: Both Touhou Soujinengi V and Touhou Genso Maroku W are getting a physical release in Japan in the form of a double pack featuring both RPG titles on the PlayStation 4 in Japan.

name: Total Fucking Psychopath
summary:
A freeware faux retro arcade game that plays like the earlier GTA games (minus automobiles) and has similar satirical themeing like Postal and Hatred.

Your main weapon is a knife, but you can also find other power-ups such as steroids to increase stabbing damage, painkillers to recover health, and pipe bombs to kill a large number of people at once (added in version 2.0). You have a "psychosis meter" that decreases all the time, and if it reaches zero it dawns upon you what horrible deeds you have done and you end your own life. The only way to increase it is to kill. The more people you kill, the more police officers are sent after you to take you out.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EGCC Airport
summary: Manchester Airport (IATA: MAN, ICAO: EGCC); Major airport in the UK, 4th busiest in terms of passenger numbers and the busiest airport in the UK, located at Ringway in the City of Manchester within Greater Manchester, UK developed for Tower! Simulator 3.

name: Toca Builders
summary:
This creative building game for kids allows you to make a whole new world in one fun app!

If you can imagine it you can build it with the six Toca Builders!

Join your new Toca Builders friends on an island far away and create a whole new world with blocks. Jump, walk, roll and rotate the builders to use their unique skills, and they will help to build whatever you can imagine!

Toca Builders is a kids app that makes it fun to drop, spray, smash and lift blocks to construct new objects - may it be a house, lamp or maybe a banana?
Let's get started by putting down some blocks.

name: Touhou Eternal Frontier
summary: Explore a 3D city and natural forests with Touhou Project characters in this Eastern 3D action indie game. Featuring multiplayer, FPS/TPS view switching, and built with Unity, it delivers an original adventure. Experience intense action in a futuristic city set in the year 2045.

name: Tour of Duty
summary: Tactical wargame that allows players to fight in Vietnam during a one year tour of duty, from John Tiller's Xquad Battles series.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Pro League Mute Set
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is the latest installment of the acclaimed first-person shooter franchise developed by the renowned Ubisoft Montreal studio.

name: Tokiros
summary: In Tokiros, explore a vast world full of unique creatures to capture and train! Build your team, face enemies in challenging tactical battles. Discover secrets, complete epic quests, and prove you're the best summoner in this exciting capture and combat game!

name: Tombers
summary: A immersive plataform game

name: Touch Fish
summary: Touch Fish is a casual fish-raising wallpaper game with a built-in console featuring lots of mini-games, truly a must-have for home, travel, and slacking off at work.

name: Together: A Wish No One Remembers
summary:
This is a visual novel with 9 possible endings.
Torn between his recent broken heart and his desire to never subject anyone to that kind of suffering, Vince decides, despite his own feelings, to learn more about this mysterious girl who just confessed her love to him - still hoping in the back of his mind that his unrequited love will one day be reciprocated.

name: Tomomi: Denkitomodachi
summary: We've all heard the stories on the news about Old Man Nakai and his crazy creations in that dank lab by the beach. But I wonder have you heard about the one that escaped? Play as Haru Takamoto in this short visual novel about a young robot-girl and her journey in becoming 'human'.

name: Tokeijikake no Apocalypse
summary: This is a Japanese visual novel in which the "box of the future" has opened. Follow the protagonist as she continues to search for a bit of happiness repeated time.

name: TOEIC Test: Jissen Tokkun
summary: Edutainment title focusing on the TOEIC English test for non-native speakers.

name: Topworld
summary: Explore Topworld, a fantasy sandbox game where you, as a mage, uncover a world of possibilities. Craft, build, fight, and create your world in a charming pixel art style. Shape the land to your liking and experience your unique adventure!

name: Totem Smash
summary:
Smash, smash, smash as many totems as you can!!! And watch your head...

Sounds easy, right?

name: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
summary: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis is a reimagining of Lara Croft’s 1996 genre-defining game with visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, modern gameplay, and new surprises that honor the spirit of the original.

name: Tomb Raider: Catalyst
summary: Set in the wake of a mythical cataclysm that has unleashed ancient secrets and awakened mysterious guardian forces, Tomb Raider: Catalyst follows Lara Croft on a new adventure across Northern India.

name: Tournamentris
summary: This is a new type of merge puzzle game with the theme of ‘tournament table x falling block puzzle’. To clear the rising panels, drop the pieces and stack them to complete the ‘tournament’!

name: Tower Defense: Infinite War
summary: In the far future, people build a base on a strange planet they don't know about to protect their limited resources. Protect your base from the incessant invasion of extraterrestrial beings!

name: Tour: Chess Puzzles
summary: Elegant, varied and challenging chess-themed puzzles. No prior knowledge of chess is needed.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Pure Raspberry Disc
summary: Fandisc of the Yamanote Boys series featuring Momose Ayumu (Honey Milk), Kujou Takumi (Super Mint), and Rudo Jesus (Dark Cherry).

name: Tomte Trouble
summary: Tomte Trouble is a single-screen platformer for the Game Boy Color. Collect all of the tomte and progress through sixteen bite-sized stages.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition of Tom Clancy's The Division 2 includes:

The Year 1 Pass.
A 3-days early access to the game.

Also get bonus digital content:

The Battleworn Secret Service Pack including the Secret service outfit, a rare quality emote, and exotic quality M4A1 Skin.
The First Responder Pack, including a special outfit and weapon skin.
The Elite Agent Pack, including an exotic Assault Rifle, an exclusive skill effect, and additional stash space.

name: ToHeart
summary: ToHeart is a remake of the original 1997 romance visual novel with a completely revised script, full voice acting for all characters except the protagonist, new art, and mini-games.

name: Tommy and the Monster Prison
summary: A point-and-click stealth adventure. The player must disarm traps and reach the chests, which open the prison gates without being detected. Eighty stages set in a dark, medieval dungeon atmosphere teeming with monsters.

name: Top Racer Collection: Top Racer Customs
summary: Get ready to experience the ultimate Top Racer, the classic arcade racing game from the 90s: nostalgia, speed, and now the freedom to customize your car's look and performance.

name: Tomb Raider
summary: A remaster of the original Tomb Raider, including The Unfinished Business expansion as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

name: Tour de France 2021
summary: Win the yellow jersey with the official game of the Tour de France 2021. All 21 stages and the biggest Classics are included. Experience a new objective system, a redesigned My Tour mode and other new features!

name: Total War: Attila - Viking Forefathers Culture Pack
summary: The Viking Forefathers Culture Pack adds The Norsemen as a new playable culture to Total War: Attila. These factions may be used in Single or Multiplayer Campaign modes and Custom and Multiplayer battles.

name: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword
summary: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword is a video game based on the Tomb Raider series. It is a sequel to the first Tomb Raider for the same system. You'll experience the usual amounts of ledge jumping and rope climbing that one expects from a game in the Tomb Raider series, as well as a number of activities unique to this particular release, such as boss battles, demolitions, and submarine piloting.

name: Town of Salem - The Coven
summary:
Town of Salem - The Coven is an expansion to the indie smash hit murder mystery game.
This expansion introduces 15 new roles, a new faction, exclusive queues, and rotating game modes.

name: Touhou Traveler
summary: The game is cleared by upgrading the player by catching treasure chests and monsters that are continuously created, and by catching the final boss. Along with simple quests, NPCs will tell you how to play and in which direction to play.

name: Tower VR
summary: Tower VR is a virtual reality based tower defense game. It is a strategy game where you open the monster gate and build and upgrade the tower by selecting the appropriate location and type to stop the monsters from running all over the place. But Tower VR is not just a strategy game.

name: Tobari Dream Ocean + Nightmare
summary:
For those of you who want to experience the best of both worlds, the sea of fun and the sea of nightmares, this is the place. A 2D action game with various magic 'Tobari Dream Ocean' and Nightmarish additional content 'Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare' bundle!

Tobari Dream Ocean is a side-scrolling action game in which players clear stages while acquiring various kinds of magic from enemies.

Tobari Dream Ocean Nightmare, dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari Dream Ocean' – now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

Nightmare is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer. For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

name: ToGather:Island
summary: ToGather:Island is an open world survival game set in a science-fantasy archipelago.

name: Towaga: Among Shadows
summary: Towaga: Among Shadows is an action-packed shoot'em up arcade adventure. Inspired by classic 2D animation, embark on a journey to combat the darkness and find the light within you.

name: Tomboys Need Love Too!
summary: Tomboys Need Love Too is a visual novel about two childhood friends who are starting to see one another as members of the opposite sex.

name: Toripon
summary:
Take photos of cute birds doing cute things, and make people happy on the internet.

Explore a surprisingly spacious inner-city apartment filled with far too many pet birds doing their own silly things. Take photos and share them with your internet friends to spread the love around. The more bird pictures you post, the more your follower count will go up! Just like real life!

Unlock new birds by taking the right pictures and see what hidden secrets you can find....

name: Towerlings
summary: Watch autonomous adventurers climb a 100-floor tower while you guide their fate through strategic intervention. No direct control — only decisions. Choose when to summon, strengthen, or protect, and decide whether to build an army or raise a few elite heroes.

name: Toy Generals
summary: Toy soldiers! Prepare for battle! The house is full of enemies and we must drive them out! Sniper - get in position! Grenadier - your target is the tower. Infantry - attack! Check every nook and cranny, battle the enemy in the attic, in the garden, up in the treehouse. Build up your unique squad and take back the house!

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys Black Vanilla Disc
summary: Fandisc of the Yamanote Boys series featuring Ninomiya Yuuto (Honey Milk), Lucy (Super Mint), and Hamada Shinnosuke (Dark Cherry).

name: Touhou Shinreibyou: Ten Desires
summary: Touhou Shinreibyou ~ Ten Desires is the thirteenth official game of the Touhou Project. A trial version of the game was released on the web in April, and at Reitaisai 8 in May of 2011. The full game was released at Comiket 80 on August 13, 2011.

name: Townscaper
summary: Townscaper is an experimental passion project. More of a toy than a game. Pick colors from the palette, plop down colored blocks of house on the irregular grid, and watch Townscaper's underlying algorithm automatically turn those blocks into cute little houses, arches, stairways, bridges and lush backyards, depending on their configuration.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Black Ice
summary: Operation Black Ice is the first expansion released for Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege. All content released is for free to players. It adds two new Operators from the Joint Task Force 2 CTU, featuring new weapons, abilities, and gameplay upgrades.

name: Tokatonton: One-Armed Blacksmith
summary: Tokatonton: One-Armed Blacksmith is a medieval forge management sim. Craft unique weapons, satisfy demanding customers, or take risky deals for profit. Rebuild a crumbling forge with two struggling blacksmiths.

name: Touhou Volleyball
summary: A fast-paced casual volleyball game featuring iconic Touhou characters. Jump, receive, and spike in chaotic 1vs1 matches!

name: Tower Inc.
summary: Tower Inc. is a survival horror of shifting floors, monsters, and betrayal. Collect quotas as fuel to keep the elevator running — without them, you won’t survive the climb. Work with your team… or leave them behind.

name: Tourist in Trouble: Escape The PickPockets!
summary:
Sub-minute runs, dodge pickpockets, race the sights!

I made a tiny time-attack game after seeing pickpocketing spike around tourist hotspots and wondered if that tension could work as a speedrun. Each run lasts seconds to a couple of minutes; the timer is your score. You sprint across crowded tourist maps to hit five random landmarks, dodge pickpockets that blend into the crowd, and invest coins in a small skill tree (including literally shouting at people to clear your path). Built for quick resets, routing, and shaving off seconds.

name: Tornado
summary: Tornado lets players join forces with Toki and the other members of the Cosmic Cleaners as they set out to restore all of Earth's buildings, vehicles, inhabitants and other obscure objects that have been stolen by the envious Prince using his mischievous "Black Hole Device." Using a combination of stylus and microphone activated controls, players will travel across Planet 69 as they level up and max out their "Tornado Machines" to literally uproot everything in their paths in effort to take back what Prince has wrongfully stolen and return it to Earth.

name: Tossdown
summary: Run, jump and dash through chaos, dodging hazards and enemies as you deliver packages. Fight back with wacky power-ups and choose from a variety of perks to improve your chances of survival. It’s Crazy taxi meets Jet Set Radio!

name: Torchure
summary: A top-down roguelite action game set in alternate industrial Britain. Use stealth, fire, and chaos to sabotage regimes and spark revolution. Dynamic pixel-art mayhem inspired by Hotline Miami and Broforce.

name: Top Spin 2
summary: Everything you loved about Top Spin is back and made even better. The peerless player-creator is reborn with the powerful Digital Identity that truly puts you in the game. Experience the pro tour in venues that are alive and dynamic with environmental elements that react to your play. Characters are even more stunning with the addition of HD technology and the inclusion of the top players in the world like Maria Sharapova, Venus Williams, Andy Roddick, Lleyton Hewitt and Roger Federer. Create realistic player models and customize them with the highest level of details. Hairstyles, sweatbands, shirts, shorts, shoes, and more allow you to create a player with your look and your style. Silky smooth animations, vibrant colors, and hi-definition technology delivers illustrious depictions of players, stadiums, and crowds bringing tennis to life on the Xbox 360.

name: Torikago no Mukougawa
summary:
You are summoned as a liberator in a world called Femto. A liberator is someone who can perform the ritual of freeing someone's mind. Your goal is to escape the world of Femto and return to your own world, and only way to do so is by freeing people's minds.

The game consists of two main gameplay elements. The adventure part which is where the story unfolds and the typical visual novel dialogues are gone through, and a puzzle part which consists of two phases, a phase for moving puzzle pieces, and a phase for moving to a location. The puzzle picture consists of 15 key pieces in total, and you need to put them all in their right place to be able to escape. Each phase gives you limited number of turns and/or points you can spend until it is finished, after which another phase will start. By determining location, you will move onto corresponding adventure part. In each location during adventure element, various events will occur and you will be able to talk to characters there. After the adventure part is over, you will return to the puzzle screen and continue with the next moving phase of puzzle pieces.

name: Total War: Warhammer II - The Hunter & The Beast
summary: The Hunter & The Beast is the latest Lords Pack for Total War: Warhammer II. Introducing two rival Legendary Lords from the world of Warhammer Fantasy Battles, each with their own objectives, mechanics, units and playstyle, for use in both the Eye of the Vortex and Mortal Empires campaigns, and custom/multiplayer battles.

name: Total War: Warhammer II - The Hunter & The Beast
summary: The Hunter & The Beast is the latest Lords Pack for Total War: Warhammer II. Introducing two rival Legendary Lords from the world of Warhammer Fantasy Battles, each with their own objectives, mechanics, units and playstyle, for use in both the Eye of the Vortex and Mortal Empires campaigns, and custom/multiplayer battles.

name: Toki Tori 3D
summary: Toki Tori is his name, and collecting eggs is his game. In this puzzle/platform game, players use a variety of items such as the Telewarp, InstantRock and Slug Sucker.

name: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side Premium 3rd Story
summary:
Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side Premium 3rd Story is an enhanced port of Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side: 3rd Story on the Nintendo DS.

New features:
• New character Tatsuya
• Renewed graphics with a 2D animation system
