summary: Tomorrow Don't Come is a contextual puzzle game about depression and how it feels to be stuck.

name: To Be A King: Volume 2 - Part 1
summary: Continue the exciting story of a general thrust into uncertain circumstances. Factions all want something from you. Choose who to bed or wed. Compete or consolidate with your foes. Discover more about the factions fighting for dominance in Caudium.

name: Touhou Dream Runner
summary: A one button rhythm action game that Youmu beats her enemies(?) to the beat.

name: Tokyo Joshikou Seifuku o Nuida Zukan: Part 3
Tom & Jerry MMO
summary: Tom & Jerry MMO will give you ability to create your own cat or mouse for PVP action.

name: Tower Defense Sudden Attack
summary: Tower Defense Sudden Attack is a strategy game set in a military base seized by many terrorists and now is under attack.

name: Totally Rad
summary: Totally Rad is an action game in which you play Jake, a magician wannabe being trained by the Master Magician Zebediah. One day, during his training, Jake is attacked by surprise by unknown foes who kidnap Allison, his girlfriend. Then, Jake has to save her and discover what lies behind that attack.

name: Tokyo Ghoul: To Eat or Not to Eat
summary:
A Custom Card Game based off of Tokyo Ghoul, through and through.

Game is web based, by the way. You can play it now if you want but if you do, you won't get the updated Starter Collection nor Starter Decks that will be available when the release happens. You'll just have to stick with buying packs from the Market. They're all free by the way, you start off with, I think, 25k coins.

name: Toader
summary: Toader is a fun spin on an old school classic. Dodge cars, snowballs, lawn mowers, space ships and more as you hop through a world much larger than you are.

name: Tohou Spell Bubble: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2
summary: Touhou Youyoumu Arrangements Pack Vol.2 is a collection of popular arrangement tracks from the rhythm game including "What About Progress?", "Necrofantasia: Arr.Demetori" and more.

name: Tokyo Yamanote Boys for V Fan Disc
summary: PlayStation Vita port that includes all fandiscs in the Tokyo Yamanote Boys series.

name: Toraware no Shoujo: Caged Girl
summary: Toraware no Shoujo is a freeware horror-adventure game. It follows the story of Ai, a girl caged in the attic of her house by her father, and her attempts to escape.

name: Torture Jam 1
summary: The God of flesh and desire has such sights to show you. But in order to be granted that privilege, he demands tribute in form of good suffering. He has graciously given Map-Center's community time to create a Strogg inspired torture maps worthy of his magnificence. Featuring seven new maps, a hub level, final boss and several intermissions.

name: Torch 2081
summary: Torch 2081 is a Tron-like game. You're a pilot in the World Military Service on the planet Torch. What was once your only concern, the defense of your planet against the warriors of Craylon, has now changed to an even greater, more difficult challenge. Fireballs, which are what remains of planets once destroyed during an earlier interplanetary nuclear war, are now bombarding the your planet's surface and destroying its inhabitants. You must now protect the surface of Torch. Using an old S.D.G. (surface defense glider) designed for defense of the planet against the Craylon race, you must use it to construct metallic panels above the planet surface increasing the structure of the candar shield. You must attempt to limit the flight area of the incoming fireballs by flying from panel to panel and edge to edge of your territory constructing new panels while avoiding your ships destruction.

name: Towers, Turrets, Turtles
summary: Build and upgrade mazes of turrets to Defend your computer tower from the Pea Horde in this bright and colourful Tower Defence!

name: Tower Skydiver
summary: A fast paced skydiving adventure game through different worlds, dodge objects, fight bosses and find your way through mazes to get to the end of the stages.

name: Tournament: Blood & Steel
summary: Tournament: Blood & Steel is a single player medieval action game with role playing elements. Set in the fictional land of Edron, the player must fight in gladiatorial tournaments to earn fame and riches!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: OMDB Airport
summary: IATA: DXB, ICAO: OMDB - Dubai International is now one of the busiest international airports in the world. Developed by FeelThere for Tower! Simulator 3 as one of the first non US airport to be released.

name: Torus Trooper
summary: Torus Trooper is a fast-paced abstract scrolling shooter game. It features 3D graphics and a style similar to that of games such as Tempest.

name: Tower of Wishes
summary: Tower Of Wishes is a family friendly, fun Match 3. The game also includes mini games such as Hidden Object, Find Differences, Chain Solitaire and Sliders for that bit of extra fun!

name: Tornado: Low Level
summary: Top-down war shooter

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon 2: 2007 - First Contact
summary: Sequel to Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon; part one of the Ghost Recon 2 "trilogy".

name: Tourists Kidnapped a Little Bear
summary:
Tourists Kidnapped a Little Bear is a retro 8 bit game with cute five-color-arts, fx-sounds 
and represents a story of a brave mama bear.Mama bear need's to find and rescue her beloved little bear who was kidnapped by tourists.

name: To Hell With It
summary: Hack 'n' Slash your way up Hell's corporate ladder in this "down the rabbit hole" adventure to retrieve your stolen cat from the Underworld!

name: Toji no Miko: Kizamishi Issen no Tomoshibi
Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san Puzzle Party
summary: The first mobile game based on the 2024 anime Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings In Russian. It's a puzzle game which uses characters and shots from the anime.

name: Tokushu Houdoubu
summary: Tokushu Houdoubu is a game that aims to show you the real world, from reality to beyond. The gamer becomes the Assistant Director of the Tokuho Show, Yuzuhara Ryo. He's sent to all sorts of regions in Japan to find explanations for what appears to be supernatural occurrences. The cases you investigate in might include mysterious fires, poltergeist reports, kappas and all sorts of chilling crimes. But you don't have to head into the dark unknown alone, the mysterious co-workers and the cute assistant are all behind you.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear
Total War! The Complete SSG Macintosh Wargame Collection
summary:
This compilation contains the wargames developed by Strategic Studies Group for Apple Macintosh.

The bundle includes Warlords 1, Halls of Montezuma, Carriers at War 1 & 2, Panzer Battles, Gold of the Americas, Rommel in North Africa, Macarthur's War in Korea, Decisive Battles of the American Civil War Vol. 1, 2, 3.

In addition to the original games Total War! includes all the scenarios previously published in the developer's Run5 magazine and 20 new scenarios.

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Cyberfunk
summary: When futuristic tech meets bass pumping funk music... Cyberfunk is the future of package delivery!

name: Toadette Strikes
summary:
Toadette Strikes is a fan game by Thunder Dragon, sequel to Toad Strikes Back.
It is a side-scroller platformer with mechanics borrowed from the Super Mario series, mainly Super Mario Bros. 2.

name: -Top Bear-
summary:
This is a game made for #bearjam 2017(GameJolt)! an annual celebration of bears. made under 7 days.

You are playing as a pilot bear, whose stuff has been taken away from you. What stuff? Play the game to find out!

I promise, the prize if you manages to complete this game is worthy of the internet.

-Gameplay-
This is a top down shooter game inspired by shooty skies and old retro game. Made with love. Featuring 2 boss fight!
You only have one life! Die and you have to restart! If you manage to get to the end, though, something's waiting.

name: Tohou Sky Arena: Matsuri Climax - Playable Character: Toyosatomimi no Miko
Tod Stein
summary: Tod Stein - a space shooter about the brave surfer Ivan, who during his hard life has to fly into a dangerous nebula at high speeds..

name: Tomb Rumble: Cursed Sorcerer
summary: The curse of the Sorcerer falls upon you: Reincarnate as a sparkling Sorcerer and get your revenge on other adventurers by unleashing deadly spells! Ranging from mobility to cosmetic or offensive spells, the sorcerer is a careful but polyvalent curse!

name: Tour de Force
summary: In this unique racing game from 1987, take to the bike track to experience the thrills and excitement of international Grand Prix cycling. Contains both the Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum versions of the game.

name: Tower of Heresy
summary: Tower of Heresy is an Rpg Action game, with a fantasy setting and extensive and explorable maps. Choose a class and get ready to challenge the pitfalls of the tower among terrifying monsters and deadly traps. Will you be a slave of the tower or the Monarch?

name: Touhou Monster TD: Nagae Iku
summary: Add a usable character Nagae Iku into the game.

name: Toy Robot
summary: You are a simple toy robot with no name, no memory and no serial number. You discover that your battery is damaged. Now the journey to repair your battery and save your life begins... In this journey you will need to: Run, Jump, Shoot and Solve Puzzles.

name: To the Snowland
summary: What can a man do for his child? Help the man on this journey, help them fight all kinds of monsters and challenges. Test yourself on platforms that are easy to learn and hard to master.

name: Top Spin 2
summary: Legacy cell phone port of Top Spin 2.

name: ToyBox Christmas
summary: The Christmas toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Christmas has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon
summary: Two soldiers fight their way through the streets of a futuristic Northern Europe in this on rails, third person shooter for the Wii.

name: Tonka Construction 2
summary: Assist TONKA JOE in building a desert road, a city, a mountain resort and excavate a quarry. The only limit to your success is the use of 12 different heavy duty equipment and your imagination.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - Shi Xie
summary: Nepotism rules in the world of Shi Xie, and he is determined to spread his inner circle across the whole of China. Shi Xie will stop at nothing to get his family into power; After all, it’s all about who you know.

name: Towers of Oz
summary: A tower defense published by Alawar.

name: Tokyo Xtreme Racer Drift
summary:
This fifth installment in the Tokyo Xtreme series, focuses more on the "drifting" style of racing and has two different distinctive challenges of racing included in the game. Players can race professionally during day races, earning money to upgrade their cars and try to get the big sponsorships. During night races, players can race for pride, along with the ability to bet money and even car parts.

Players will race in the scenic mountains of Japan, in real life courses on uphill and downhill races and even during varying weather and seasonal conditions, effecting the handling of the cars as they would in real life. There is also a rivalry battling system in the game, making the races more dangerous as opponents try to stop them at all costs.

It also features real licensed high-end vehicles such as Nissan, Toyota, Subaru, Audi, Alfa Romeo, Mini, Volkswagen among many others.

name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: Two Farce
summary: It won’t be long before the historic literature club will be disbanded as there’s just the protagonist and his kouhai Chisa left. Even as they worry about the club’s future, they carried on with their daily trivial exchanges in the club room together. And so, they became closer by the day.

name: Towelfight 2: The Monocle of Destiny
summary: With a monocle infused with the power of shooting-animals-out-of-your-face, what could possibly stop you on your quest to get back to the dog park?

name: Tom Clancy's Origin Collection
summary: Team Rainbow is a multinational task force comprised of counter-terrorism experts from around the globe. Equipped with state-of-the-art weapons, Team Rainbow is deployed during terrorist crises. When all other attempts have failed, Rainbow is brought in to save the lives of innocent people. They do not negotiate with terror. They destroy it.

name: Tough: Dark Fight
summary: Based on the popular "Tough" comic, featured in Young Jump magazine. Tough: Dark Fight features an original story which takes place in the two years between the original "Koukou Tekken-den Tough" comic (published between 1993 and 2003) and the later "Tough" reprisal series. Fans of the series will be able to experience the happenings of those two missing years. The game features a number of characters, including eight who haven't been featured in the comic.

name: Total Extreme Wrestling 2005
summary: The 2005 installment of the wrestling sim series; the first of which released under the Grey Dog Software hood. This game has been released as Freeware.

name: Toodles & Toddlers
summary: Toodles & Toddlers is a survival horror puzzle hybrid with physics transformation crafting and resource chains. Experiment to discover what is possible then use the tools you create to combat hostile creatures while coping with fear and hunger.

name: Tobe's Vertical Adventure
summary: Tobe's Vertical Adventure is an indie, retro, platformer starring Tobe, the overly devoted gamer who's been forced on a treasure hunt by his materialistic crush, Nana. The big headed duo will travel back and forth in the crumbling caves in search of treasures while rescuing fluffy animals, making you scream kawaii ne~ along the way. With 2 unique characters and a total of 4 islands and 16 levels to explore, Tobe's Vertical Adventure shall bring you back to the 16-bit era.

name: Tombo Breaker VR
summary: Tombo Breaker VR - Action Parkour game with procedural generated levels.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KSFO Airport
summary: San Francisco International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Totally Spies!
summary: Totally Spies! is an Action game, developed by Mistic Software and published by Atari, which was released in 2005.

name: Tohoku Daigaku Karei Igaku Kenkyuusho: Kawashima Ryuuta Kyouju Kanshuu - Mono Sugoku Nou wo Kitaeru 5-Funkan no Oni Training
Toy Puzzle
summary: Fill the board with colorful blocks, once a vertical or horizontal line is filled, it will be cleared and new space will be freed up! If you don't have any spaces for new blocks it's game over.

name: Total War: Shogun 2 - Fall of the Samurai: The Saga Faction Pack
summary: The Saga Faction Pack adds a new playable faction to Total War: Shogun 2 - Fall of the Samurai, previously only available in the Limited Edition, for use in single or multiplayer Campaign modes and Custom and Multiplayer Battles.

name: Top Jump
summary: Climb fast, reach the top! In Top Jump, race through a perilous cave to dominate the leaderboard. Time can be rewound in training, but in ranked mode, use it wisely to avoid losing precious seconds. Precision, speed, and strategy are key in this addictive vertical challenge!

name: Total War: Elysium
summary: Total War: Elysium is a Total War spinoff game. It's a card collection game where players take turns to battle each other with a deck of unit cards under the command of a historical leader, in a similar vein to how Hearthstone combat and gameplay works.

name: Toofan AlAqsa
summary: A shooter game is about protecting AlAqsa and Palestine . for the support of Palestine .. #FreePalestine

name: Tony Stewart's All-American Racing: Texas Motor Speedway Dirt Track
summary: Take a trip to the Lone Star State with The Texas Motor Speedway Dirt Track!

name: Tokyo Xanadu eX+: Limited Edition
summary:
Tokyo Xanadu eX+: Limited Edition includes:
- New side stories, characters, modes, dungeons and quests.
- 9-inch Deluxe White Shroud Figure - top-quality, hyper-detailed poly-resin sculpture of the mysterious White Shroud character, fully assembled and painted, with detachable display base.
- 60-page Exclusive Art Collection - full-color book featuring over 300 of dazzling images of characters and settings plus important information on the world of Tokyo Xanadu.
- Blade Card Game Deck - includes boxed set of 44 printed cards and 2-player rules, so you can take the Blade game into the real world.
- CD Soundtrack - with 10 music tracks from the game, including the opening song "Seize the Day" (lyrics by Kyo Hifumi).
- Collector's Box - everything immaculately packed, including a separate printed carton for the White Shroud figure.

name: Touring Car Champions
summary: Touring Car Champions was the first attempt to create a game based on the Australian Touring Car Championship and Bathurst 1000. It was also the first to use full motion video as the base for a racing game.

name: Toukiden 2: Mission Collection Set 2
summary: 9 missions are included in this set.

name: ToD Fragments: Special Fun
summary: The events of this mini-game revolve around the main character of the Threads of Destiny game and his acquaintance with a mysterious lady from a brothel.

name: Today is the End of the World
summary:
Today is The End of the World.

And so was yesterday. And the day before. And it will be tomorrow.

Today is The End of the World, and everyone is coming to your backyard tonight to watch it happen. There's just one problem: your best friend Echo is missing, and it is your job to find her.

And tomorrow, she will be missing. And tomorrow, you will find her.

She’ll remember, but you won’t.

name: Toybox
summary: Hundreds of packs, thousands of items. Can you collect them all?

name: Toy Stunt Bike
summary: Toy Stunt Bike is a 3D, action-packed, micro-sized motorbike trials game.

name: Toxic Terror: Episode 2 - The Lich's Lair
summary: A malicious lich has risen and is building an army of ghouls to take over the world. It must be stopped before it's too late for humanity!

name: Tootsie Pop
summary: Tootsie Pop is a multi-platform match 2 mobile game based on the American Nostalgia brand Tootsie Pop.

name: Toxin the Game
summary: Toxin the game is a casual hardcore game. In which you are a bacterium and you only have to avoid all the soaps. The bacterium travel in Vertical sense over a person's skin avoiding the soaps that can delete it.

name: Tokyo School Life
summary: "Tokyo School Life" is the story of your trip as an exchange student in Tokyo and the three girls you meet there. Live the everyday life you love from anime and manga!

name: Toilet Fight: Open World
summary: You begin your journey as a simple cameraman, determined to survive and expose the terrible threat that Skibidi Toilets pose.

name: Toon Wars: Tank Battles
summary:
Cartoonish real-time tank battles! An exciting game with a lot of interesting maps and a possibility to customize your tank. Improve your tank and drive it right into the battle to crush enemies! You can choose any game mode: team or free-for-all.

Play as much as you can to gain experience. Complete daily quests, earn game currency, and upgrade your tank. Join your friends, create your clan, and compete to be the first on the weekly top players list.

name: Touhou Monsters Card - Phantasmal Summoner
summary: In Gensokyo magic is considered outdated and people are starting to use monsters in battle. Developed using same game engine as Touhou Soujinengi, Touhou Monsters Card is a mini RPG where the player will travel to various places and dungeons to collect more than 400 monster cards. The battle system shares similar mechanics with the Saga and Pokemon series. When there are no monsters in a player's field, they'll receive a direct attack. Monster cards can be obtained by winning battles or exploring available locations. The developer also provided online features and allows player to duel via their Twitter account.

name: Tom's Mansion
summary: Escape or Die. Not in real life, of course. It's all just a simulation, in a mansion, with 20 minutes to escape.

name: Tokyo Love +
summary: A romance/drama visual novel. School life, love, jealousy, betrayals...and YANDARE!(different endings). Available in Chinese, French and English.

name: Touhou Kimono Blast
summary: Touhou Kimono Blast is a danmaku strip 'em up shooting game, full of Touhou famous characters. A huge mystery light shooting form the dark forest. Can the girls going to defeat the monsters and solve the mystery?

name: Torment: Tides of Numenera - Legacy Edition
Touch Melo
summary: Tap, Touch and Drag notes in rhythmic timing to play. Touch Melo gives you a realistic feeling of playing music and lets you put on a performance of your dream.

name: Total Club Manager 2003
summary: Total Club Manager 2003 was a football managing simulator released for the PC in 2002

name: Toonsters: Crossing Worlds
summary: Travel the world and catch many Toonsters to build your team and become the biggest Toonsters collector!

name: Tokeis
summary: Tokeis is a board-like real-time city builder about growing your town from a tiny tile to a hexagonal empire. Collect tokens, manage resources, reorganize inefficiencies, and fortify your economy. Handle the harsh weather and defend against raiders trying to steal your riches!

name: Tonka Construction
summary: Tonka Town is in need of help, and it is up to you to lend a helping hand.

name: ToyBox Easter
summary: The Easter toys are everywhere! Can you fit them all into the toybox? ToyBox Easter has many colourful levels guaranteed to challenge your critical thinking!

name: Towers That Don't Like Each Other
summary:
The Evil Dark Lord Morgoroth has taken over the land! You must lead your armies into battle to take back the land! Fight your way through levels as you try to protect your tower while simultaneously trying to attack your enemy's tower.  
 
Note: this is a Windows exclusive. It does also require a download.

name: To Battle!: Hell's Crusade
summary: Classic, old-school, turn-based battle in a satirical medieval world. Raise a Holy Army and stop the march of Evil.

name: Tomboy: Sex in the Forest
summary: You are an ordinary programmer John. Your life revolves entirely around computers, but today, your favorite tomboy invites you to spend a weekend outdoors with her. How lucky?!

name: Too Far Too Late
summary: Embark on a Colony in Space. Build a base to ensure your colonists survive. Explore, mine resources, craft items, and thrive in a realistic atmospheric and electrical simulation. Watch out for potential dangers before it’s too late!

name: To Ash & Ember
summary: To Ash & Ember is a challenging gothic roguelite horror RPG about imperfectly saving the world. Select your pawn, lead them through terrors and tomes, and build them into heroes to face off against the Gods man failed to slay. Can you save this world or only its embers?

name: Tower of God: One Wish
summary: Tower of God is a match-3 game with fun mechanics and enjoyable Game play. The levels are varied and fun. The game also includes mini-games such as Hidden Object, Jigsaw, Memory and Slider.

name: Top Craft exploration
summary: Are you ready to start this funny building game?

name: Toy Blast
summary: Jump into the Toy world and help Amy through her adventurous journey. Blast the cubes and combine powerful boosters to beat the challenging levels. Join tournaments and events to compete with players all around the world!

name: Towering
summary: Towering is a platform game that is inspired by Red Light, Green Light. When the background is red you are frozen in place. When the background is green you can move but most platforms and objects become invisible. The challenge is to study the placement of objects during red and navigate the tower during green by relying on your memory. Watch out for dangerous obstacles and enemies which will cause you to fall down! Can you reach the treasure at the top of the tower?

name: Tower!3D Pro: KMCO Airport
summary: Orlando International Airport is an airport DLC for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Toxa
summary: ToxΔ adapts the action, adventure and unique genre. Equipped with magic warfare, teleportation, forest, sci-fi city and sea. On the same Maps, there are 2 graphic modes, namely soft and natural.

name: Totaled!
summary: Totaled! takes you for a ride in a destructive racing experience. In one of 12 cars, including hot rods, muscle, and performance cars, you must inflict as much damage on other cars as possible. Both the outer shell of each car (windows, hood, fenders, doors) and the chassis underneath can sustain damage that affects the car's performance. You can compete in 18 customizable game types and challenges, including Free for All, Stuntman, Multi-Tag, and Bus Jumping.

name: Totò Sapore e La Magica Storia Della Pizza
summary: This is the game based on the movie Totò Sapore e La Magica Storia Della Pizza.

name: Tofu Topple
summary: Competitive puzzle game that involves matching three or more blocks of the same color vertically.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer: The Bullet Reporter
summary: This content adds a story starring Aya Shamemeimaru and Momiji Inubashiri.

name: Torpedo Range
summary:
In Torpedo Range, terrorists have basically somehow taken over most of
the world. As a one-ship operation, you have to free six countries from the
terrorists' grasp to win the game: to do this, you must visit a port at each of
the six countries and destroy all the guns on the port in a shooting mini-game
to 'liberate' the country.

name: Towerspell
summary: Scrabble meets Plants Vs. Zombies! Spell words to summon monsters or cast spells in a tactically deep battle system. Fight through 50+ handmade levels in the story mode, battle your friends in online 1-on-1 PvP matches, or create and share your own levels.

name: Touhou Monjusen: Bubbling Imaginary Treasures
summary:
Touhou Monjusen ~ Bubbling Imaginary Treasures is a vertical danmaku shooting fangame developed and published by Gore, who had previously released Frantically Forbidden Fruit and Re.Phantasmagoria of Imagine Breaker.

The gameplay derives elements from several official Touhou games, such as Double Dealing Character, Wily Beast and Weakest Creature, Hidden Star in Four Seasons, and Subterranean Animism. The game features five playable characters with three partners each. Your player's weaponry depends on the partner chosen at the player select screen.

The main game mechanic is the Assist Spirit Strike system. By collecting coin items dropped by defeated enemies, you fill up a gauge at the bottom of the screen. Once you have enough money, you can spend some of these coins by pressing C to activate an Assist Spirit Strike, the exact kind varying widely depending on your player character.

name: Tonight It Follows
summary:
Escape an unrelenting horror that never stops as you make your way through a cemetery at night.
A 2D pixel art survival horror game inspired by Silent Hill!

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KPIT Airport
summary: Control over Pittsburgh International Airport (IATA: PIT, ICAO: KPIT, FAA LID: PIT), with destinations throughout North America and Europe developed by FeelThere team for Tower! Simulator 3.

name: Tormentarium
summary: Large metal-style industrial facility surrounded by caverns; features a few custom map props.

name: Toadally Awesome Game
summary: A hoppy little puzzle adventure for the Game Boy Advance!

name: Tokyo Twilight Busters
summary: An adventure game by Telenet's Wolf Team released for the NEC PC-9801. Starfish later ported the game to the DS.

name: Tomb Typing
summary: Search an ancient Egyptian tomb as you type words and letters to navigate your way through a complicated maze and search for treasures. Beware of walls and dead-end paths! It is easy to get lost so be sure to refer to the map to find your way through the maze

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya: DLC 3 Pack - Myouren Temple & Divine Spirit Mausoleum
summary: This DLC is an expansion pack for the content of "Touhou Mystia's Izakaya".

name: Tokidoki Frenzies
summary: The world's cutest friends are here! Global collaboration with fashion icon tokidoki characters appearing in a puzzle game for the first time! Meet the popular tokidoki characters in-game now!

name: Totally Accurate Dating Simulator
summary: You were stood up on your date! But you're already at the bar and won't leave without some female interaction!!! What awaits you? A simple stroll or a cult of hair enthusiasts? A pleasant conversation in a summer café or a detective investigation of a murder? Find out for yourself!

name: Tombstone Taxi
summary: In this hectic couch co-op, bullet hell, roguelike where you flamethrow zombies and rocket launch bandits, you and your crew must taxi passengers to safety through the dangerous radioactive wasteland to the safe haven city of Spirowood… but for a fee! Use money earned to upgrade weapons and more!

name: Top Pro Golf 2
summary: From the publishers of crack shmup Eliminate Down comes this two-course wonder with Japanese and American rounds to sample. Up to four players can participate for the hole or keep a tally of the overall score in tournament mode. An accomplished title.

name: Tower of Madness
summary: Tower of Madness is a linear psychological horror game where you play as a cowboy ascending an ominous floating upside down tower.

name: Tour of Neverland
summary:
Build the island of your dreams!

Run your very own farm on a tropical island!
Open up new plots of land, plant crops, construct all sorts of farming facilities, and decorate your cabin just the way you want! Catch fish straight from the ocean or go snorkeling to catch sea creatures. Build a hostel to attract visitors and make fascinating new animal friends! You can even jump in a mine cart and explore the depths of the mines in search of priceless treasures!
developers: Mars Game (Hong-Kong) Network Technology Co., Limited

name: Touhou Fugyouseki: Nightmare of Sleeping Girl
summary: Touhou Fugyouseki ~ Nightmare of Sleeping Girl is an SRPG released by Kamo, based upon AliceSoft's Widenyo.

name: Toilet Run
summary: Toilet Run is a first-person maze runner. Navigate your way to porcelain before your bladder explodes.

name: Touhou Blooming Chaos 2: Chara Pack 1
summary: This DLC is an optional playable character pack for Touhou Blooming Chaos, including Remilia Scarlet, Komeji Satori, Aki Sizuha, Tsukumo Benben and Yorigami Shion. Once purchased, you may use them and all their color palettes in game immediately. Hope you enjoy.

name: Touken Ranbu Warriors: Digital Deluxe Edition
Top Racer Mini Arcade
summary: TopRacer, the SNES classic racing game, was originally released in 1993 with a soundtrack by Barry Leitch. This realistic racer game PIKO Interactive includes 64 racing tracks in 16 countries. The mini arcade features a steering wheel, and the objective is to become the fastest driver in the race with your choice of several cars.

name: Touhou Doumeiju: Mystical Power Plant
summary: Touhou fangame and second game in the Kaisendo series. The main gameplay mechanic of Mystical Power Plant is based around collecting leaf items to fill a gauge, which causes the player to 'level up' and gain various benefits as the game proceeds. The benefits vary depending on what character duo is chosen.

name: Tomena Sanner
summary: Players control a breakdancing salesman in this game for the Wii Shop and iOS devices.

name: Toca Kitchen 2
summary: The wildly popular Toca Kitchen is back!

name: Touhou: Combinations With You
summary: Touhou: Combinations With You is a Touhou fan game made by Rodon John based on the Japanese convenience store franchise chain FamilyMart. The game consists on a single boss battle against Murasa Tenchou.

name: Touhou Jaseishou: The Last Comer
summary: Touhou fangame developed by Ido, Yuuyu and Hatsuke. The main gimmick of The Last Comer is based around collecting stars to fill a gauge, which is similar to Ten Desires' Trance gauge.

name: Toko & Kraft: Artificers
summary: As a newly graduated artificer, our protagonist is assigned to a small village connected to some very big mysteries. Combine elements alongside your (usually) trusty assistant Kraft to meet your zany customers' needs.

name: Touch Darts
summary: Touch Darts is a darts game developed by Full Fat Productions and SEGA Europe, and published by Agetec. It features a mix of individual dart competitions, mini-games and multiplayer modes.

name: Touhoumon Purple
summary: In this Pokémon Emerald rom hack, trainers capture and battle animated 'puppets' based on characters from the Touhou series. The hack also updates the battle system, using a different set of type advantages/disadvantages and implementing the physical/special split from later Pokémon games.

name: Tom Hanks is in: Jeopardy!
summary: Can you save the world from Tom Hanks?

name: Tohou Sky Arena: Matsuri Climax - Playable Character: Yukari Yakumo
Tomb Raider III
summary: A remaster of the original Tomb Raider III, including The Lost Artifact expansion as well as the ability to toggle between original and remastered graphics.

name: Tower of Dal Gurak
summary: A big castle using Quake III textures. Remake of a map with the same name from the game Blade of Darkness.

name: Tower of Osiris
summary: A high octane, Voxelized Dungeon Crawler where you must use your wits and parkour skills in order to advance up the floors. Kill all enemies in your way. Whats waiting for you at the top?

name: To Save Humanity From Virus
summary: To Save humanity From Virus is a building game where you are on a different planet trying to get resources to create a vaccine. The virus hit the earth and the only way to save humanity is to gather resources from the different planet.

name: Tough Trucks: Modified Monsters
summary: Climb into the driver's seat of an outrageous, pumped-up 4x4 and see if you can turn this right-off-the-lot machine into a genuine Modified Monster. It takes drive, determination and a big dose of brain blurrin', bone rattlin' action to earn the money to convert your stock pick-up into a real track champion. Warning! You may soil your bedliner.

name: Toewr le Fence
summary: Toewr le Fence is a memified tower defense game made by RMF_AndyPlayz! Click for more info!

name: Tom's Adventure
summary: Help Tom hack-and-slash his way though a dream from which he cannot wake up. A hand-drawn action-adventure through a dreamy world filled with fleshy monsters, insane situations and strangers that needs help.

name: Tomahawk Missile
summary: Galaxian clone - seabound this time around.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: EGLL Airport
summary: A major international airport in London, England. Heathrow Airport is used by over 80 airlines flying to 185 destinations in 84 countries. The airport is the primary hub of British Airways and is a base for Virgin Atlantic. It has four passenger terminals and a cargo terminal.

name: Toraware no Kan
summary: You woke up in the forest with amnesia. Without a cellphone, a hand bruise mark on your arm and a pack of medicine in your pocket, you search around for help. As you went into a mansion for help, a mystery man appeared before you and tell you to run away before it's too late...

name: Total War: Rome II - Black Sea Colonies
summary: The Black Sea Colonies Culture Pack introduces three new playable factions into the ROME II Grand Campaign: Cimmeria, Pergamon and Colchis.

name: Too Many Humans
summary: Too Many Humans is a real-time tactics action game where YOU play the Zombies. You bring chaos, fear, destruction, death and finally: redemption. Humanity degraded too far into greed and is hurting the planet, your sister, Gaia. Incarnate the God of decay and save the world by eradicating humanity.

name: Touhou Yumejikuu: Phantasmagoria of Dim. Dream
summary:
This game is a vertical danmaku shooting game, where two characters engage in danmaku gameplay within individual and separate play areas (aka. split-screen). Upon meeting certain conditions, players are able to unleash a variety of character-specific Spell Attacks upon their opponents in an attempt to whittle down their remaining health points.

In Story Mode, the player will face nine opponents, each more capable than the previous. Phantasmagoria of Dim.Dream also features a Match Play Mode where the player may face off against AI opponents or compete against other players, as well as watch AI vs. AI matches.

name: Total War: Shogun 2 - Fall of the Samurai: The Tsu Faction Pack
summary: The Tsu Faction Pack adds a new playable faction to Total War: Shogun 2 - Fall of the Samurai for use in single or multiplayer Campaign modes and Custom and Multiplayer Battles. Rising from humble roots, the people of Tsu are wise, artful and astute strategists.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 2: Episode 3 - Coney Island: The Hunt
Tower of Saviors
summary: Tower of Saviors is a mobile game developed by Mad Head Limited, a Hong Kong-based mobile application developer. ToS is a combination of a match 3 game and an RPG, with characters from various mythologies and cultures.

name: Tower!3D Pro: LEBL Airport
summary: Tower!3D Pro: LEBL Airport is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro.

name: Touhou Kobuto V: Burst Battle - Chibi-Chara
Touhou Kobuto V: Burst Battle - Koishi Komeiji
Touhou Kobuto V: Burst Battle - Youmu Konpaku
Tower of Guns: Steelbook Limited Edition
summary: Ascend the Tower of Guns and return to the days of circle-strafing, rocket-jumping, and twitch-based action. Tower of Guns is a throwback first-person shooter with a healthy sprinkling of roguelike-ish-y elements. Every turn brings a surprise and around every corner lies certain death! Or a new weird item! Or a ... Hugbot? Filled with random levels, crazy bosses, bizzare powerups, and tons of unlockable weapons and items, each time you step into the Tower of Guns you'll have a fresh gaming experience.

name: Torture
summary: Small Wizard/Metal map with torture chambers and some neat masks.

name: Tofu Tower
summary: See how high you can battle your way up the tower with your ever-growing collection of monster cards

name: Tower of Guardian
summary: Tower of Guardian , is 2D Fantasy Platformer RPG, tells about adventure of a wizard princess from Kingdom called "Aluria" exploring The Tower of Darkness

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Wildlands - Special Edition
summary:
Released only in japan, includes:

- Base game.
- Season Pass

name: To the Capital 2
summary: To The Capital 2 is a game in the genre jRPG with classic turn-based battles in which you have to travel together with four heroes visiting a lot of cities, dungeons, mysterious places and fight with various bosses.

name: Total War Saga: Thrones of Britannia - Limited Edition
summary:
This Limited Edition contains:

- Total War Saga: Thrones of Britannia
- Limited Edition steelbook
- Double-sided poster
- Five Collector's Cards about important faction leaders with biography

name: Tower of the Ancients
summary:
A full 360 degrees of puzzle madness - filled with mind-challenging, full colour graphics. Experience the power of the tower with a look-and-feel that will take you away from your mundane life. Challenge your dexterity and your mind with the newest brain bending 3d puzzle game.
Turn the Platform to line up your blocks witch fall from the sky rendered in a beautiful 3d environment. Listen to the surreal music score and become totally immersed in the action. The key to success, mind over matter, speed and persistence.

name: Tower Bloxx
summary: Build a skyscraper by stacking floors on top of each other. You do this by dropping them from a crane.

name: Toy Kingdom
summary: A game similar to Flicky, in which a girl must rescue the creatures and lead them to the escape doorway; enemies can be defeated by throwing furniture.

name: Toss n Go
summary: This exciting title is the first game from RCMADIAX that two players can enjoy at the same time.

name: Toraware no Palm: Refrain - Deluxe Edition
Top Striker
summary: Anime-based soccer video game released in 1992 for the Family Computer.

name: Toppl.
summary: Toppl. is a top down puzzler. Swipe, topple, rotate - Toppl is a perspective puzzle game for fans of spatial brain teasers! The goal is to move and rotate the puzzle pieces so that they match the target-shape. For perfect plays you will be rewarded a star with which you can unlock new stages. Toppl will challenge you over the course of four exciting worlds and 40 different levels with varying puzzle mechanics. For fans of demanding puzzle games is Toppl the right choice!

name: Tools Up! Garden Party: Episode 3 - Home Sweet Home
summary: Fall is in the air and so is Tools Up! Garden Party's final fall episode! Get ready to pick pumpkins, chase after crunchy leaves, face a new challenger, the Stinky Smog, and much more in Episode 3: Home Sweet Home.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell: Elite Echelon Edition
summary: This Elite Echelon Edition includes one copy each of Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Chaos Theory, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Double Agent, Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Conviction Deluxe Edition.

name: Touchdown: Armor League
summary:
In Touchdown, each team is made up of 6 players. It's up to you to carry the ball past the enemy Touchdown line by any means necessary to win your team points. Blast opponents out of the sky, use rocket boosters to create sneak attacks, and even fully obliterate enemy power suits. Show no mercy.
Teams score a point every time they make a touchdown. The team with the most points after a 15 minute match wins the game. It's fast-paced, skill-intensive, and will require your team to work as one to win.

name: Town Squared
summary: Town Squared is a peaceful city building and puzzle game. Create cute architecture as you take a tiny voyage, discovering and unlocking new buildings along the way.

name: TouchSports Tennis 2012 HD
summary: Tired of Tennis games with difficult controls that just don't work? Tennis 2012's Natural Motion controls allow players to effortlessly move on the court and play like a pro. Dragging one finger on the screen moves the tennis player. Swiping with 2 fingers swings the racket with ultimate precision and controls. Its that easy! Place a drop shot just over the net, out of your opponents reach, lob the ball over your opponent to back court, or smash a top spin cross court. A control system designed for pro players and beginners alike!

name: Toyful Wonderworld
summary: A retro first-person game inspired by shooters of the 90s. Collect weapons and blast your way through the mysterious Toyful Wonderworld, where a cast of colorful enemies will stand in your way. Discover the secrets of this weird place and find out what has caused the Toyfriends to go crazy!

name: Touhou Shinpiroku: Urban Legend in Limbo.
summary: The 5th fighting game in the Touhou Project and 14.5th game overall.

name: Tomato Adventure
summary:
From AlphaDream and Graphic Research, Tomato Adventure is an RPG released only in Japan. Taking place in a kingdom with tomatoes abound, the gameplay is similar to that of the Mario & Luigi series.

Tomato Adventure, in terms of gameplay mechanics, is the predecessor of the Mario & Luigi series of games, even having its engine reused in the first installment on the GameBoy Advance. Originally developed for the Game Boy Color, Tomato Adventure transitioned to its successor, the Game Boy Advance, when the latter was released. The main difference between the two versions is believed to lie in the quality of audio and graphics, although little substantial information exists on the Game Boy Color version.

Tomato Adventure incorporates a number of RPG standards such as leveling up and travelling to various places to advance the plot. However, the battle system itself is substantially different than most games in the genre, as players have a more active role in how the fights turn out. During the player's turn, they can select a character's attack and then their target. From there, they must perform one of a number of different minigames which determines how successful the attack is. These range from simple button mashers to stopping a meter at a specific point. While attacks can land without reaching the optimal point, their effectiveness tends to be severed in the process. Additionally, each attack has a separate amount of usage points which dictate how many times the player can use that specific attack before needing to revitalize themselves.

name: Tower!3D Pro: KIAD Airport
summary: Washington Dulles International AirportIATA: IAD, ICAO: KIAD, FAAAn international airport in the Eastern United States, located in Loudoun County and Fairfax County in Virginia, 26 miles (42 km) west of Downtown Washington, D.C.

name: To the Top
summary: It's her wish that you climb to the top. It's mine to make you angry doing it.

name: Tour de France 2009
summary:
Take control of a professional team and guide them through the 2009 version of Tour de France.

This 2009 entry was ported from the PSP and exclusive to Xbox Live Arcade.

name: Tower!3D: KDFW Airport
summary: Dallas is an add-on airport for Tower!3D Pro giving you an additional airport for your controlling challenge. It is the primary international airport serving the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex area in the U.S. state of Texas.

name: Tornado
summary: 200 feet. 600 knots. Adrenaline off the scale.

name: Torment
summary: Torment is a Doom II episode replacement mod of six levels including original music, created by Shamus Young in 1995.

name: To Fight
summary: This map is the third and final entry in Eternal's 2x2 series, following the previous month's Eclipse and Nightomb. Once again, it features only two textures and two flats used for the entirety of the map, but unlike its predecessors, it is a slaughter map, more in the vein of Eternal's previous maps, Generator of Evil and Belial's Bad Brain.

name: Tour de Drone
summary: Tour de Drone - Race Your drone around A.I. enhanced 3D photorealistic holographic paintings of locations from around the world.

name: TOY DJ - An Electronic Music Rhythm Game
summary: A rhythm game where you are the DJ. Tap launchpad tiles and scratch your record.

name: Toriko: Gourmet ga Battle
summary: Toriko: Gourmet ga Battle is an action multiplayer (4-player) game with 45 characters (support ones included). It has more than 25 stages.

name: Tokyo Xanadu New Project
summary:
Set in the Japanese city of Kyoto, this new game depicts the story of juveniles who travel around the otherworldly realm known as “Xanadu.”

While it shares the same world as Tokyo Xanadu, which is set in the Japanese city of Tokyo, the setting is all-new. It is currently in development as a “completely new title” with all game systems built from the ground up.

name: Too Many Santas!
summary: A Christmas wish come true, or a holiday nightmare? The Santa Claus dating sim you can play all year round!

name: Toilet Rush Draw: Poo and Pee
Toyland Racer
summary:
Razer, Spacer, Humpty Dumpty, Tubby and Freddy Banana are five friends organizing a tournament on 10 wacky tracks placed in 5 different worlds, in order to determine who is the fastest inhabitant of their charming world.

The player slips into the role of one of these merry friends. Every driver has a different, fantasy vehicle, which differs in acceleration, traction and weight from the other drivers' cars. Race through lovely hills, villages, and ghostly woods. Collect bonus weapons and options like bombs, rockets, jump, and turbo boost. The physics engine is enabled for crazy stunts and wild crashes.

name: Total War: Arena
summary:
Total War: Arena is a free-to-play, team-based strategy game, putting players in the middle of epic-scale realtime battles.

Join 10v10 battles designed for multiplayer realtime strategy fans, with armies of thousands on the battlefield. Control three units of warriors, led by an iconic commander from history, each with their own battle style. Level up commanders and units to open up more specialist skills, weaponry, armour and abilities. Decisive strategies, combat tactics and teamwork decide who is victorious.

name: Torrential
summary: Prepare yourself for a bit of a challenge. Simple but difficult bullet hell, semi-similar to the classics with modernized controls. Cuts to the chase with only boss levels, no filler in between, just a torrent of bullets.

name: Toree Saturn
summary: Toree Saturn is a speed based 3D Platformer featuring a round bird with sunglasses and a backpack!

name: Tomb Defender
summary: Sandbox tower defense game in the style of a pulp adventure movie. With full control over the layout of the tomb. Includes challenges and a procedural map generator.

name: Toga
summary: Dai is a little boy who unwittingly enters another world after investigating a suspicious door. At first glance, it looks like a stranger's house...

name: Tower Lab
summary: Roguelite tower defense where enemies can’t be killed, knock them off with physics instead! Build devastating contraptions that push, pull, and launch enemies. Unlock towers, discover broken synergies, and dominate through creative combinations.

name: Tough Beans
summary:
Sweetheart. Buttercup. Sugar. Baby. Babe? Babe?

For as long as you can remember, you've never really had a name--never needed one. For 22 years people have swaddled you in epithets, letting you know that even though you're not quite on the right track, the world is there to hold your hand. Your father, your friends, your boyfriend. Gas station attendants.

Sweetie, do you know what you're doing there?

Truth be told, it's never really mattered to you before. Sometimes you've even liked it. Not today, though. Today something is wrong.

name: Tome Rush
summary: Manage and grow a team of wizards to explore magical mission sites of increasing difficulty! Building a well balanced and cooperative team is imperative as you defeat enemies, collect artifacts, and protect the world from a looming threat.

name: Too Slime and Snake
summary:
Too Slime And Snake - is a puzzle game where you need to reach the star!

Borrow and apply functions to clear the way to the star
Three different characters, 14 types of cells, 100 levels are waiting for you

name: To Eternity
summary: Play as a hero who wants to seek eternity, face unknown monsters, do tense and exciting slashing, gain the ability to purchase attributes of gold, and defeat the final Boss, forward to eternity in your mind!

name: TOCA Race Driver 3 Challenge
summary:
TOCA Race Driver 3 Challenge is the third game in the series. The main change is the new game mode "World Challenge" in which players take part in mission-based challenges.
Tracks include the British GT championship, Australia's V8 Supercars, Germany's DTM events and American Race series.

name: Touch Online
summary: Touch Online is a rhythm based, dancing simulation game published by Perfect World Entertainment. Customize an avatar and play as a unique character in multiple modes of dance.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Pro League Ash Set
summary: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege is the latest installment of the acclaimed first-person shooter franchise developed by the renowned Ubisoft Montreal studio.

name: Tokio: Tokyo-to Dai 24-ku
summary: Tokio: Tokyo-to Dai 24-ku of Tokyo is a sci-fi city simulator from Artdink, the company behind the A-Train economy sim series. Playing it will require careful planning, improvisation, and correspondence with your city's constituents to fix problems and make everyone happy. You can personally telephone residents to hear their opinions, or even tune in on various TV channels to survey Tokio. Every little counts: your political party platform, the techno-industrial automation needed to power Tokio & its economy, and even space tourism via space shuttles and other programs—among others! Elements like artificial gravity, weather control, and orbital mining can also make or break your term as mayor, so manage it all to the best of your ability.

name: Tosui Kitan
summary: There is a mysterious ancestral ways in the village. Don't speak loudly at night, Don't fight against others at night, Don't show up at night if you are a woman..... All the people in the village has the same surname.....

name: Tom Clancy's Politika
summary:
The strategy game of political intrigue in modern day Russia.

Yeltsin is dead! Russia in turmoil!

Tom Clancy's pre-millennium Russia will challenge you to save a crumbling empire. President Boris Yeltsin has suddenly died without an obvious successor, leaving a power vacuum. You belong to one of the eight major factions including the KGB, Church and Mafia that have risen from the chaos and are competing to take control of one of the most powerful nations in the world.

Whether playing against computer opponents or multiple human players online, you'll face constant uprisings, catastrophic events and shifting alliances to reach your ultimate goal- to become the new leader of Russia.

name: Tour de France 2014
summary: The 2014 edition of the annual cycling franchise.

name: Touch Me
summary: Touch me challenges the player to remember the sequence of sight and sound, and correctly repeat the pattern. The drop of the quarter in the top-mounted acceptor activates the computer to present a single-tone sound. When the sound occurs, the corresponding button lights to give a visual clue. Then the game pauses long enough for the player to "confirm" the sound to the computer by pressing the same button that lit. Oops! Wrong button? ERROR number one… and a lighted window tells the player he's goofed. Then another chance… the sound and lighted button are repeated by the computer. Another pause … right! You've hit the right button(s) in the right sequence, and the game goes on to another sound sequence. Every correct player response adds an additional sound/note to the sequence. "Beep – beep – bloop – beep – bloop" … Did you correctly repeat those sounds when the buttons lit? Sorry, only three errors per game. You'll have to insert another 25¢ and try again!

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Kokoro Hata
summary: Adds the player character Kokoro Hata to Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded.

name: Toukiden 2: Free Alliances Version
summary: "The newest title in the hunting-action series "Toukiden," characteristic for its thrilling Targeted Destruction and a Japanese view of the world, will be available as a free-to-play version. You can enjoy participating in Group Missions online with the Free Alliances Version free of charge. (Some items, for example, must be purchased.) You can also play the game up to and including the middle stages of the first chapter of the retail version's story free of charge. In addition, not only can you fight together with players of the retail version, but you can import your save data to the retail version as well."

name: Tokyo 7th Sisters
summary: Tokyo 7th Sisters is a fully-voiced rhythm / idol raising simulation game with card battling components developed by Donuts Co. Ltd. Originally released in Japan for iOS on February 2014 and later released for Android devices on November 2014.

name: Toxic
summary: Use bombs to blow up the landscape and monsters avoiding toxic waste.

name: Totality
summary: A simulation of a total solar eclipse, complete with time control, a pane of #14 welding glass, and a pinhole projector.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Shadow Vanguard
summary: For the first time on iPhone and iPod touch, enjoy a new FPS experience that allows you to lead a team of elite soldiers! A global terrorist organization threatens the world balance. Only one team can prevent this: The Rainbow Unit!

name: Tower in the Sky
summary: Tower in the Sky was built to challenge experienced strategy gamers. Easy to pick up and play on normal and easy difficulty levels, while hard and extreme levels will challenge even the most hardcore strategy role playing game vets.

name: Touch the Devil VR
summary:
You can touch a sexy devil!
You can view them from anywhere with 360 degree VR, and touch them to get a variety of reactions!
Enjoy the reaction!

name: Tower Pets
summary: Build the perfect team and compete with other players to win the tournament!

name: Total Football
summary: For the ultimate football experience no other game can beat, it's Total Football! Experience the passion and excitement of world class football with a multitude of different kicks, skills and unique features. Stunning animation, realistic ball movement, 2-player action and a unique controllable celebrations feature ensure you will never stop playing Total Football!

name: Tokoton Mahjong! Joryuu Pro ni Chousen! Tetsuman Megami Special
To Burn in Memory
summary: Explore a city that never existed, and uncover its secret history through the memories of those caught in the chaos of a Europe spiraling ever faster into war.

name: TomHanksFrThMmrs
summary: A Point-and-Click starring Tom Hanks. Made for Hanks Jam.

name: Toadled
summary: A seemingly normal afternoon turns into an apocalyptic day when one tiny toad gains the ability to grow more and more with each thing he eats...

name: Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series Vol. 1: Niji-iro no Seishun
summary: Tokimeki Memorial Drama Series vol. 1: Nijiro no Seishun is a visual novel spin-off game of the original Tokimeki Memorial. Nijiiro no Seishun features Saki Nijino, who cheers the player on as they spend the game trying to make it on the school soccer team's main lineup.

name: To Kyrstem
summary: To Kyrstem is a sci-fi and romantic visual novel.

name: Toilet Farm
summary: Breed toilets and sell them to accomplish goals!

name: Total Jigsaw
summary: Containing over 100 high quality jigsaw puzzles that will knock your socks off!

name: Total War: Rome II - Culture Pack: Black Seas Colonies
summary:
The Black Sea Colonies Culture Pack introduces three new playable factions into the ROME II Grand Campaign: Cimmeria, Pergamon and Colchis. 
 
Originally citizens of the Greek States, these pioneering peoples have settled far from home, intermingling their customs with those of far-flung societies to create unique cultures of their own. The Black Sea Colonies bring a rich new gameplay flavour to ROME II through their unique traits, battlefield units and buildings, and hybrid unit-rosters.

name: Total Gravity
summary: Navigate cosmic chaos, altering bullet trajectories in epic space battles. Forge alliances, uncover secrets, and fight back to save your besieged home planet.

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Sakuya Izayoi
summary: Adds the player character Sakuya Izayoi and the side story Clock Remains to Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded.

name: Tokyo Stranger
summary: Tokyo Stranger is an aerial genre of text horror game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympic Games. You play as a tourist from an exotic country, looking for any possibility to escape Tokyo in a static world.

name: Touchgrind Skate 2
summary:
Just like in real skateboarding or fingerboarding, Touchgrind Skate 2 is a game of skill that takes 10 minutes to understand but a lifetime to master. Learn the tricks, complete challenges, and unlock new skateboard parts. 
 
Get the highest score in time-limited Competition mode, rip freely and complete challenges in Jam Session mode, challenge your friends in the turn-based multiplayer Game of S.K.A.T.E or export video clips and show off your best lines.

name: Tough Story: Big Hell
summary: They took your life. Now you're back to send everybody to burn in hell!

name: Tower of Lust
summary:
In a quiet village on the outskirts of the universe, in a house in which a mysterious light comes out of the windows, you live and collect porn magazines, your collection shocks the minds of people and not just people ... 
 
Waking up at night from strange sounds, you saw that terrible monsters all as one snatch your porn. 
Noticing that you woke up, they fled quickly. 
You managed to grab one and under the hellish torment with your right hand, he told you that all the monsters went to the abandoned tower of lust. 
Neither thinking minutes, only having time to get dressed, you fly after monsters, in order to save the most valuable in your life.

name: Total War Shogun 2: Fall of the Samurai Collection
summary: This bundle contains Total War Shogun 2: Fall Of The Samurai and all DLCs.

name: Touge Racers
summary: Touge Racers is a single-play racing game. It is a race battle on the pass with the old car team that I met at the pass. A racing game where you can drift down a winding road.

name: Total Domination
summary: Total Domination developed by Plarium throws players into a world shambling all around you. It's up to you to restore mankind and create your empire from the ground up. Build the strongest army, research new technologies, recover lost knowledge, and fight for world control.

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Dress Code
summary: Stay fashionable with new shirts, pants, hats, hair, lips, and so much more! Over 80 new cosmetics to choose from so you're looking fresh, funky, or freaky!

name: Total Pinball 25: 3D Tables
summary: Total Pinball 25 is an Action game, developed by Stellar Stone and published by GameMill Publishing,

name: Total War Master Collection
summary:
This Bundle contains:

- Medieval II: Total War
- Rome: Total War - Collection
- Empire: Total War
- Napoleon: Total War
- Total War: SHOGUN 2
- Total War: Shogun 2 - Fall of the Samurai
- Viking: Battle for Asgard
- Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition

name: Top Player's Golf
summary: An overall average golf game for the Neo Geo MVS. Play on two different courses in three different modes (Nassau, Skins, and Match play).

name: Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded: Alice Margatroid
summary: Adds the player character Alice Margatroid to Touhou Genso Wanderer Reloaded.

name: Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Fuju Houroku
summary: A portable entry in the Tokyo Majin Gakuen series, featuring a trading card game mixed with RPG elements.

name: Torico's B-day Gift Hunt
summary: Torico's b-day gift hunt - Toriko slept peacefully, looking forward to the upcoming party on her birthday, but bad luck - all the gifts were stolen! Restore justice and return the gifts to their place in this game inspired by the classic platformers of the 90s!

name: Tomb of Pharaohs
summary: Collect keys to unlock the "Pharaohs Tomb" and fight his remains to pass the level! Dodge traps, scorpions and mummies in a procedurally generated maze!

name: Tombo Survivor
summary: The government of the evil pig and its Tombos have taken over Polombia

name: Totally Reliable Delivery Service: Stunt Sets
summary: Stunt Sets Island is a giant private island being used as the primary location of all upcoming motion pictures.

name: Toilet Kids
summary:
Toilet Kids is a vertical shoot 'em up featuring a world filled with scatological enemies and humor. It was released exclusively on the PC Engine.

A young boy is accidentally flushed town the toilet one night, appearing in a mysterious world, and must defeat the world's guardian before he can go home. The game has four stages total, each of which has a different theme, and the player is able to target both air enemies and ground enemies in a system similar to that introduced in Xevious.

name: Topgolf with Pro Putt
summary:
- Full swing Topgolf range with your favorite Topgolf games 
- Realistic physics model 
- Multiplayer experience 
- YouTube web player 
- Various Topgolf venue games 
- Four Pro Putt courses 
- Topgolf Putt Lounge  
- A 10,000 square foot practice green. 
- Competition to match your skill level. 
- Achievements and leaderboards for bragging rights

name: Tower!2011:SE - Phoenix KPHX Airport
summary: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport is and airport DLC for Tower!2011:SE

name: Touki Denshou Angel Eyes
summary:
Angel Eyes is a 2D versus fighting game featuring an all-female cast, which plays much like contemporaries such as King of Fighters. A curious aspect of the game is that four of the eight regular characters are hand-animated sprites, while the other four are pre-rendered graphics as in Donkey Kong Country or Rise of the Robots.

In addition to the standard Arcade and Versus modes, the PlayStation release adds a dedicated Story mode for each character, plus a training mode. There also numerous secret characters to unlock, including 2D-sprite versions of some of the 3D characters, and the story mode bosses.

name: Toz
summary: Sand, powder, life simulation game

name: Tornado Raid / Tornado Blade
summary: “An interactive action VN” ---- An action game with the story of serial weapons “Tornado Raid”. An RPG that an assistant of weapon development finds out herself “Tornado Blade”. These two games are compiled, and rebirth as one package of SF human drama.

name: Tokyo Jungle Mobile
summary: A simplified spin-off from Sony's animal survival game made for PlayStation Mobile.

name: Touhou Suimusou: Immaterial and Missing Power
summary: Touhou Suimusou: Immaterial and Missing Power is the 7.5th installment of the Touhou Project by Team Shanghai Alice's sole member ZUN along with conjunction with Twilight Frontier. It is called "7.5" because the events chronologically take place between Perfect Cherry Blossom (TH07) and Imperishable Night (TH08). It was developed alongside Imperishable Night and released at the following Comiket 67.

name: Total Immersion Racing
summary: Total Immersion Racing is a bare-bones rendition of Gran Turismo 3 or Sega GT 2002, albeit without the preponderance of cars and special effects. What's left over is a driving simulation that offers the rich gameplay of these heavy hitters, as well as a graphical show that's nearly on par with them, but none of the frills or splash that would attract casual players in search of a vicarious speed rush. It's a game for people who want to discover what the weekly toil of GT-class competition is really like, who understand that actual racing often entails driving around the same course lap after lap without much fear of hazards or obstacles, and who don't mind that the ultimate reward is the ability to drive a handful of different cars for various teams on tracks located throughout the world.

name: Tom Clancy's SSN
summary: Tom Clancy's SSN is a simulation of the 688i (i.e. Los Angeles-class) nuclear hunter/killer submarine. The player commands the USS Cheyenne in a limited war against China over the Spratly Islands in a 15-mission campaign where they'll perform a wide variety of missions from patrol to escort, from boomer hunt to convoy attack.

name: Tornado
summary: Fly the Tornado multi-role combat aircraft in this classic simulator. Master simulator missions and graduate to multi-aircraft multi-mission campaigns involving a vast array of aircraft and ground vehicles. Includes the Tornado: Operation Desert Storm expansion.

name: Topplz
summary: Go through a collection of fun and challenging levels in this ever addictive physics game. Go hurtling through the air and bounce off the trampolines to bring down all the standing blocks, and collect trophies in each level!

name: Torrente 3: The Protector
summary: A video game based on the Spanish film of the same name by Santiago Segura.

name: TobPaCharge
summary: An anime 2d turn-based fighting game. Fireball away!

name: Tower of Hero
summary:
Fill dungeons with over 100 heroes!
An exhilarating game where you can fill dungeons with vast armies of heroes and attack the enemy monsters.

name: Tony Hawk's Vert
summary: Drop into half-pipe skateboarding insanity in the newest mobile installment to the award-winning franchise featuring the world’s greatest skating legend. With an innovative point-of-view, perform incredible tricks like Tony's 900 and get fans screaming to score awesome point combos! This fast paced skating game will have you performing complex aerial tricks in no time with its easy control system. To mix it up, play bonus mini-games such as star reporter and capture the best tricks on your in game camera. The better the trick the better picture. To get to the top, you have to get vertical!

name: Torej 3
summary: Torej 3 is a puzzle game where the goal is to build a tower without it collapsing and falling of the platform. Solve all the levels and build all the towers.

name: Town of Illustive
summary: A group of students from Falica High School have been dared by their classmate and class president Wade Severstone. Solving the mysteries that spread from generation to generation once and for all.

name: Tower of Doom
summary: Tower of Doom is a VR arcade shooter in which the player has to survive multiple waves of enemies in different levels. Each round the player gets to choose one out of four auto-generated guns in order to move up the highscoreboard and make it to the next stage.

name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Heartland
summary: Tom Clancy's The Division Heartland is a free-to-play game set in The Division universe. Heartland is a standalone game that does not require previous experience with the series but it will provide an all new view on the universe in a new setting.

name: Together My Headers
summary: Together My Headers is a puzzle game that helps cute characters in trouble. Enjoy direct communication with your character

name: Touhou Fantasy Day
summary: 这是一款东方+传统RPG游戏。 幻想乡的太阳突然不会落下，永日威胁着整个幻想乡的安全, 于此同时，各地的小妖精们也蠢蠢欲动，一切都在预示着幻想乡又要发生一次巨大的异变......

name: Tokimeki no Houkago
summary: Tokimeki no Houkago is a spin-off game of the original Tokimeki Memorial. It was released for PlayStation on July 16, 1998 (was labeled by PSOne Books on September 18, 2003) and the PlayStation Network on February 24, 2010 in Japan.

name: Toilet in Wonderland
summary: Toilet in Wonderland is a surreal exploration game made in RPG Maker 2000. It's a parody of Alice in Wonderland, where instead of the world being created by the protagonist's imagination, it is created by the protagonist, Mira's, constipation.

name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3
summary:
The line-up of street and vert riders include Elissa Steamer, Jamie Thomas, Steve Caballero, Rune Glifberg, Geoff Rowley, Andrew Reynolds, Rodney Mullen, Eric Koston, Chad Muska, Bucky Lasek and Bam Margera from MTV's Jackass (and Tony Hawk, of course). All characters have different skills in abilities like spin or balance.

The player uses items around the streets or the park to jump from or over to increase the score, and pull of as many wild and wacky tricks as possible. The main difference to the other versions of the game is the level design and perspective: The environments are side-scrolling and linear. However, there are several of those tracks side-by-side which can be switched at ramps. There are three playing modes: career (a campaign through all nine levels), single session (accumulating as many points as possible within a time limit) and free skating.
Tony Hawk's Pro Skater returns with an all new line-up of skaters and an all new line-up of parks to crash through.

The line-up of street and vert riders include Elissa Steamer, Jamie Thomas, Steve Caballero, Rune Glifberg, Geoff Rowley, Andrew Reynolds, Rodney Mullen, Eric Koston, Chad Muska, Bucky Lasek and Bam Margera from MTV's Jackass (and Tony Hawk, of course). All characters have different skills in abilities like spin or balance.

The player uses items around the streets or the park to jump from or over to increase the score, and pull of as many wild and wacky tricks as possible. The main difference to the other versions of the game is the level design and perspective: The environments are side-scrolling and linear. However, there are several of those tracks side-by-side which can be switched at ramps. There are three playing modes: career (a campaign through all nine levels), single session (accumulating as many points as possible within a time limit) and free skating.

name: Total War: Shogun 2 - Sengoku Jidai Unit Pack
summary: The Total War: SHOGUN 2 Sengoku Jidai Unit Pack adds 10 new elite units for use across the different game modes of SHOGUN 2. Once you've purchased the content, you will unlock all 10 of these versatile units in single and multiplayer Campaign mode under the conditions stated below. They will also be available in the Avatar Conquest and single player Battle modes of the game when playing with the appropriate clan.

name: Town & Country Surf Designs II: Thrilla's Surfari
summary: Whoa, Thrilla Gorilla! Bag your boards and lay back tall for the raddest, weirdest surf and skate action ever! Wazula, an evil Kahuna, has stolen your babe and taken her to Africa. No curbs and quarter-pipes here, just the ultimate skate challenge of gnarly jungles and bakin' deserts! It's hardcore surfin' down killer volcanoes and mammoth waterfalls... ever catch a wave riding a shark? Wazula's got some smooth moves of his own, like a two-headed flying Rhino, a saw-toothed Great White, and a way-tough Lava Monster big as a volcano. So get rippin' through the scorpions, slashin' through the rapids, and trash that Wazula doofus! But don't choke, Thrilla... or your babe's toast.

name: Town & Country Surf Designs: Wood & Water Rage
summary: O.K. dudes, the time has come to really get radical. You and the rest of "Da Boys", T&C's famous group of skate and surf crazies, can kick out and pull off some awesome maneuvers together. Whether you're jammin' the ramps, jumping the cracks, riding the rails or just laying back tall, the skate action is hotter than hot!

name: Tomorrow for Mar
summary: Pass your final, graduate university and... finally confess?! Tomorrow for Mar is a 2.5D VN about crushes, tricky finals and starting a new chapter of your life.

name: Tomb Guard VR
summary: Minds-on and hands-on. Customize the layout of various traps to build defense system. Protecting the tomb civilization from being plundered, you will battle with the Tomb Raiders by using BOW,SWORD and SHIELD, etc.. Archery and attack are very important, while the the layout of TRAPS is the key to victory!

name: Tower of Hanoi Puzzle
summary:
The Tower of Hanoi is a mathematical game or puzzle.
It consists of three rods, and a number of disks of different sizes which can slide onto any rod.
The puzzle starts with the disks in a neat stack in ascending order of size on one rod, the smallest at the top, thus making a conical shape.

name: Tony Tough 2: A Rake's Progress
summary: A prequel to Tony Tough and the Night of Roasted Moths. Gameplay focuses on conversations with strange characters, puzzle solving, and combining and using items found throughout the game with the objective to make sense out of a mystery which involves the disappearance of seven ancient statues and Tony's own maid, Cornelia Cook, as well as the death of Cornelia's grandmother Florence Cook.

name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell
summary: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell is a remake that will draw from the rich canvas of the brand. The game will be rebuilt from the ground up using Ubisoft's own Snowdrop engine to deliver new-generation visuals and gameplay, and the dynamic lighting and shadows the series is known for.

name: Tornado: Operation Desert Storm
summary: Tornado: Operation Desert Storm is an expansion for Digital Integration's 1993 flight sim TORNADO, adding two new variants of the titular Panavia Tornado aircraft as well as an Gulf War campaign.

name: Tomahawk
summary: A wireframe flight simulator based around the Apache AH-64 helicopter.

name: Tokusatsu Bouken Katsugeki Super Hero Retsuden
summary: An action adventure game featuring characters from various sentai franchises.

name: To Take Root Among the Stars
summary:
To take root Among the Stars is a short narrative platformer.

Play as Mei Hashimoto, one of the colonists send to an exoplanet to prepare it for the arrival of the rest of humanity.

Explore the colony and its surrounding flora and fauna. Talk to your fellow colonists and send a message to earth via the relay station at the top of the nearby mountain.

name: Toy Factory
summary: In Toy Factory, a fun time management game, Mr. Joy-Joy leaves a garage full of toys to his niece Wilma. Shortly after, two reindeers enter and explain explain how Uncle Joy-Joy used to provide Santa Claus with toys. To help them out, Wilma becomes the new toymaker, serving elves and cleaning up after messy reindeers. Will you help her save Christmas? Enjoy Toy Factory today!

name: Topdown Showdown
summary: The premier top down Smash inspired indie fighting game! Play with up to four players locally or online with our growing community of passionate players! 16 characters, colorful animations, plenty of modes to play, and an awesome single player story mode!

name: Top Dungeon War
summary: Your are hero and mission is clear: defeat the monsters, claim the treasure, and save the hostages who have been taken captive by the evil forces that dwell within the dungeon. But this will not be an easy task. The monsters are relentless, and their numbers are vast. From hordes of slavering goblins to towering giants and deadly dragons, you will need all of your skills and abilities to overcome the obstacles that stand in your way.

name: Tommy Moe's Winter Extreme: Skiing & Snowboarding
summary: In Winter Extreme, the player can partake in a series of skiing and snowboarding events including the Downhill where the player speeds down a course in order to finish the course as fast as possible in an allotted time by speeding through checkpoints. The Slalom has the same set-up where the player has to finish the course in an allotted time by passing through gates, but also has to contend with twists, turns and various other obstacles in the players path. The Giant Slalom is similar except for more obstacles and a longer path.

name: Tomb of the Mask
summary: Tomb of the Mask is an arcade game, which takes place in an infinite procedurally generated vertical labyrinth. Seeking for adventure you get into a tomb, where you find a strange mask. You wear it and suddenly realize that you can now climb walls - easily and promptly.

name: Tomb Raider: Underworld - Lara's Shadow
summary: Lara's Shadow is an exclusive chapter of Tomb Raider Underworld for Xbox 360. Lara's Shadow allows the player to control Lara's deadly facsimile, the Lara's Doppelgänger in a mission to put an end to the Croft lineage once and for all.

name: Tom's Cruise
summary: Tom and Kimberly are newlyweds and they chose to afford a wonderful cruise on the luxury "Queen Beatrice" ship for their honeymoon. After a long night of partying, Tom wakes up alone in his cabin ... his wife has disappeared, like his wallet and the door is locked. You'll now have to find a way to leave your room then thoroughly investigate to unravel this story and find your wife.

name: Topple Tactics
summary: Topple Tactics is a physics-based multiplayer tower defense game where one huge player places towers whilst the little players must get to the end of the map in order to defeat the huge player!

name: Touhou Renkyouto: Subterranean Festival of Love and Jealousy
summary: Touhou Renkyouto is a top-down bullet hell title starring the green-eyed Parsee Mizuhashi. Adventure from from the Underworld to the surface and back again to solve an incident involving stray spirits causing chaos, and maybe help Parsee realize her love along the way.

name: Touhou Seikaen: Blue devil in the Belvedere
summary: Mysterious red eyes popped up in forest, the shrine was raided by unknown vermin, ominous black magic diffused everywhere, while the scarlet devil had been awaiting for opportunity... Is it an magic outbreak, or a conspiracy? Now, set out on a journey to the truth and unravel the enigmas!
